hotel_desc_summary:
Featuring free WiFi, a spa center and an outdoor pool, Aqua Mirage Club & Aqua Parc - All Inclusive offers accommodations in Marrakesh, just 6 miles from Olive Plantations. There is a restaurant and bar and guests can have fun at the water park. Free private parking is available on site.
The rooms come with a flat-screen TV. A terrace or balcony are featured in certain rooms. Each room includes a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.
You will find a 24-hour front desk and hairdresser's at the property.
You can play tennis, ping-pong, and pool at the hotel. Dam Le bassin de la Menara is 6 miles from Aqua Mirage Club & Aqua Parc , and Olive Plantations is 6 miles away. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 5 miles from Aqua Mirage Club & Aqua Parc - All Inclusive.

hotel_desc_summary:
This luxurious boutique hotel sits in a beautiful 7-acre landscaped park in Marrakech. It offers a heated infinity pool, a spa and elegant air-conditioned accommodations, some with a private pool.
Set by the pool, Les Deux Tours’ restaurant Pergola provides A la carte lunch. The gourmet restaurant, Le Salammbô, serves Moroccan and French gourmet cuisine, prepared with plants and vegetables from the organic garden. The 2 restaurants also offer a wide selection of wines.
Guests at hotel Les Deux Tours can choose from rooms and suites with balcony or terrace overlooking the garden. They all have tile floors and some feature a sitting area with fireplace. Room service is available.
In a superb classic Moroccan building, the spa has a hammam and a professional staff that offer a range of exotic treatments. The outdoor pool, heated in winter, is surrounded by a terrace where guests can enjoy drinks and snacks all day long.
In addition to the facilities already listed, Les Deux Tours also features a DVD room, baby equipment and a night watchman. Taxis and a shuttle service to and from Marrakech city center are available upon request at the 24-hour front desk.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Four Seasons Resort Marrakech
hotel_desc_summary:
Four Seasons is a 3 minute drive from the Menara Gardens. It features an outdoor swimming pool surrounded by palm trees and lounge chairs, a rooftop terrace and 4 restaurants. A spa center and free Wi-Fi are available.
Rooms and suites have a balcony with views of the grounds, the pool or the mountains. They have air conditioning, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with free toiletries, a bathrobe and a bathtub or shower.
Guests are invited to enjoy a daily buffet breakfast at this 5-star hotel. Four Seasons have 4 restaurants that serve Andalusian, Moroccan and Italian specialties. Meals can be served in the guest rooms upon request.
This property offers a tennis court, a business center and a spa center with a steam bath and a hot tub. Massage treatments are available upon request and a shuttle service from Casablanca can be arranged for an extra fee.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Dar Rhizlane, Palais Table d'hôtes & SPA
hotel_desc_summary:
Surrounded by a large garden with an outdoor pool, Hôtel Dar Rhizlane is located in L’Hivernage, Marrakesh, 1.2 miles from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It boasts a spa.
Each air-conditioned room has Moroccan décor with a private terrace with views over the garden. They are equipped with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a private bathroom.
The restaurants prepare Moroccan and international cuisine served in the traditional dining area or on the terrace beside the pool. Guests are invited to participate in workshops on how to make local recipes.
Hôtel Dar Rhizlane is facing Menara Gardens, and Agdal Gardens is 1.9 miles away. Marrakesh ONCF Train station is 2 Km away and Marrakech Menara Airport is 2.7 Km from the hotel.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Tigmiza Suites & Pavillons
hotel_desc_summary:
With views of the Atlas Mountains, this 5-star hotel is 15 minutes’ drive from Marrakech’s Medina and Jamaâ El Fna Square. Set in a garden with a pool, it has a spa, terrace and a restaurant.
Free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV are included in every air-conditioned suite. Each individually decorated suite has a private bathroom, a lounge and a view of the surrounding area. Guests received a VIP welcome with tea and Moroccan pastries.
A continental breakfast is provided in the guest's room or on the terrace and for other meals the restaurant serves Moroccan and French cuisine. There are 4 bars including a poolside bar and the Moroccan lounge welcomes you for tea or coffee at midday.
You can choose a body treatment at the spa or make use of the free access to the fitness room. Tigmiza Suites & Pavillons has a ballroom offering cinema and DVD projections, and at a supplement organises transfers and tours.
Within a 10-minute drive of the hotel you will find the Palmeraie Museum and Amelkis Golf Club. Marrakech Menara Airport is 11.2 miles away and free airport transfers upon arrival are available.

Guest rooms are equipped with a TV with satellite channels. All rooms have a private bathroom including a hairdryer. Guests are welcomed with a bottle of water in the room. Free Wi-Fi access is available in public areas.
The restaurant serves Moroccan cuisine and guests can enjoy a drink in the hotel bar. A buffet breakfast, lunch and dinner are served daily.
Le Pacha nightclub is open from Monday to Friday and the hotel offers a children’s club. Free parking is provided on-site. 
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8 for a two-person trip.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Les Jardins De La Médina
hotel_desc_summary:
In Marrakesh’s historic center and close to Jamaâ El Fna Square this hotel has exotic gardens, an outdoor pool, spa with hammam, steam bath and traditional Moroccan beauty treatments.
Each modern, air-conditioned and soundproof room at Les Jardins De La Medina features a shared balcony with views of the pool and garden. They come with free Wi-Fi, satellite TV and a private bathroom.
Les Jardins’ restaurant and bar has views of the gardens and serves a mixture of Mediterranean and Moroccan cuisine, using fresh, local produce. Moroccan cooking courses are available.
Activities in the area include hiking and horseback riding, and tours are available to book from the 24-hour front desk. Agdal Gardens is less than half a mile from the Riad, and Marrakesh Menara Airport is 4 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated in the Hassan II Oasis, this Riad with a pool has a spa offering massages, body treatments and a hammam. It is on the road to Ourika Valley, 1.2 miles from the Agdal Gardens.
Each room includes an en suite bathroom, a living room with a fireplace and free Wi-Fi access. The air-conditioned rooms have views over the garden and the outdoor swimming pool.
Breakfast is available daily and the restaurant of Riad Jawad serves traditional home-made Moroccan cuisine. Guests are offered mint tea and Moroccan pastries upon arrival. A chamber maid and cook are at guests' disposition.
Riad Jawad has 24 hour reception, a terrace and it is surrounded by a spacious garden with diverse plants and flowers.
The Jamaâ El Fna Square, Koutoubia Mosque, and Marrakech-Menara Airport are all 3.7 miles away from this Riad. Airport transfers can be organised and there is a daily shuttle service to the city centre.

hotel_desc_summary:
Next to the Palais El Badi, in the heart of the Medina, this charming traditional Berber-style riad, is near the Dar Si Said Museum and Jamaâ El Fna Square.
Decorated with natural Berber materials such as natural stone, burnt bricks, terracotta, clay and wood, the Riad Carina welcomes you in a characterful and authentic setting.
The patio with its basin offers a cosy setting to eat, socialise or simply unwind. Guests can also relax in the flowered pergola on the large terrace or in the Moroccan lounge.
The rooms at the Riad Carina are decorated in the same natural style as the rest of the riad using the same materials. They offer individual air conditioning and heating as well as free Wi-Fi access.

The riad provides breakfast every morning, which can be enjoyed on the terrace, on the grounds or around the pool. You can also have a drink from the bar accompanied with traditional cuisine.

hotel_desc_summary:
Come and discover a singular and original place on the road to Ourika valley : a 4-star equivalent guest house with an architecture and construction of a Berber village with traditional materials which offer a great elegance to the property.
Behind a modest village gate followed by two carved arcades doors, Jnane Leila offers 4 rooms and 7 suites with chimneys and terraces giving on the swimming pool and the luxury garden of emanations of jasmines, oranges.
Each suite is equipped with an interior patio equipped with multicoloured sofas. Enjoy the intimacy while smelling the exuberant flower of the bougainvillea or the delicate button of the jasmine.
Free Transfer from Airport to Jnane Leila

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated in the Medina of Marrakech, this luxury riad is a 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It has a heated pool in the garden and a spa with 2 traditional hammams and 5 massage rooms.
Each air-conditioned room and suite includes free Wi-Fi, an LCD TV and a seating area with fireplace. The rooms and suite have a private terrace. Some rooms overlook the gardens and others have a spa bath.
Les Trois Saveurs restaurant offers French, Moroccan and Asian cuisine. Meals are served in the dining area or on the terrace overlooking swimming pool and gardens. Guests can enjoy a drink in the piano bar or the buffet breakfast by the swimming pool.
All bookings at La Maison Arabe include a bottle of wine and afternoon tea. Cooking workshops are possible upon request.
The hotel is a 20-minute drive from the Marrakech Airport. For extra fees, private parking is available on site for guests with a car.

Located in Marrakech Medina, Riad Al Rimal offers a rooftop terrace with a hot tub, a pool in the central courtyard and a hammam. Jemaa El Fna Square is a 2-minute walk away.
Decorated in a traditional Moroccan style, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature a view of the patio and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom includes a hairdryer and free toiletries.
A traditional breakfast is provided each morning at Riad Al Rimal. Guests can also sample Moroccan specialities in the dining room, upon request.
Additional features include the organisation of tour excursions, airport transfers and a traditional lounge. The Koutoubia Mosque is a 5-minute walk away and Marrakech Menara Airport is ideally located 4.3 miles from the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
Showcasing an outdoor pool and year-round outdoor pool, Domaine Abiad is located in the Palmeraie neighborhood in Marrakesh. Metro Shopping (Marrakech) is 2.2 miles away.
The pet-friendly property is air conditioned and is equipped with a sitting area with a satellite flat-screen TV and DVD player. Some units feature a terrace and/or balcony with pool or garden views. There is also a dining area and a kitchen fitted with an oven. A microwave, a toaster and refrigerator are also available, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. There is a private bathroom with a bathtub and bathrobes in each unit. Towels are provided.
Domaine Abiad also includes a sun terrace. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. The property also has grocery deliveries.
You can play ping-pong at the property, and the area is popular for golfing. Museum des Amis de Marrakech is 3.9 miles from Domaine Abiad. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 7 miles from Domaine Abiad.

hotel_desc_summary:
Le Méridien N’Fis is in 14 acres of lush parkland in the Menara district of the city. Guests can enjoy views of the mountains, garden, park or swimming pool from the rooms and suites.
Once twilight falls, the enchanting spectacle of the illuminated Andalusian gardens, complete with tinkling fountains and coconut trees silhouetted against the dusk, is an unrivaled sight of scenic beauty.
Le Méridien N’Fis offers three world-class restaurants, and spectacular spa facilities. Two of the finest golf courses in Morocco are located near the hotel.

hotel_desc_summary:
Facing the Royal Palace's ancient walls, this luxury 5-star hotel is a 10-minute drive from Djemaa El Fna square and from Marrakesh Airport. It features an indoor and outdoor pools, a garden and free 24/7 access to a fitness center.
Ryad Mogador Agdal Hotel & Spa provides spacious and elegant rooms with a private balcony overlooking the pool, the Agdal garden or the Atlas mountains. All rooms have Satellite TV, a refrigerator and a sitting area.
The hotel features 3 restaurants serving international and Moroccan cuisine. A buffet breakfast is served every morning. Guests can also have a snack at the pool bar, or enjoy mint tea in the lounge area.
The spa center features a sauna, hammam, hot tub and an indoor swimming pool.
Ryad Mogador Agdal Hotel & Spa is located near a golf course, Al Mazar shopping center and the Pacha nightclub. A free shuttle bus to the center of the city is available every 2 hours.

In Marrakech’s Medina (historic center), a 3-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, this Riad is housed in a restored house with traditional architecture. It features a spa, a garden and a furnished terrace showcasing Medina views.

A 10-minute walk from the Koutoubia Mosque and a 10-minute drive from the Majorelle Garden, this Riad is 4.5 miles from Marrakech Menara Airport. Tours and transportation can be organized.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Ayadina is located a 10 minute walk from the Majorelle Gardens. It provides individually decorated suites with Moroccan details. Free Wi-Fi and free parking are available.
Ayadina suites have satellite TV with a video jukebox offering 250 movies. Each suite has a private bathroom with Sens de Marrakech brand bathroom products. Guests receive a welcome basket with homemade Moroccan bakeries, mineral water, fruit, incense and candles.
Riad Ayadina has a swimming pool with integrated massage jets. Guests are invited to relax on the terrace that has olive and orange trees as well as a view of the Atlas Mountains. The terrace also has a dining area near the pool and a solarium. Ayadina serves Moroccan and French cuisine.
The riad’s spa, Bains d’Ayadina, consists of 2 massage rooms, a sauna, hammam and aesthetic cabin where guests can have beauty treatments. The spa uses traditional, natural products containing Argan oil.

hotel_desc_summary:
Just an 8-minute drive from the center of Marrakech, this luxury hotel is set within 5 acres of exotic garden. It has a free airport shuttle service, a swimming pool and a traditional spa with a hammam.
All air-conditioned rooms have a patio or balcony with views of the pool or grounds. They include a flat-screen TV, minibar and spa tub, and others also feature an iPod docking station and fireplace. Egyptian cotton linens and bathrobes are provided in all rooms.
The Maroliano restaurant serves Moroccan and Italian cuisine. There is also La Pergola restaurant, which serves summer-style cuisine.
The Medina is just 5 miles away and Marrakech’s famous luxury golf courses are within 4 miles of the hotel. Free Wi-Fi access is available throughout the entire hotel and free private parking is available on site.

Additional facilities at this riad include an on-site spa, with a hot tub, hammam and a massage room. There is also a rooftop terrace, where you can try the continental breakfast and admire the panoramic views.
The rooms and suites at Riad Alkaderi combine a contemporary and Moroccan style. Each one features views of the interior courtyard, air conditioning and free Wi-Fi access. Some also have a seating area.
Private parking is available with an extra cost and the staff can also organise tours and excursions. The Bahia Palace is a 5-minute walk away and the Majorelle Gardens are 2.5 miles from the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the heart of the Medina of Marrakesh, this romantic 3-star equivalent guesthouse is a fully renovated riad, located within five minutes walk from the famous and colourful Jamaâ El Fna market area. Free Wi-Fi is available.
You will also be close to Palace Badia, known for its gardens and bright, enticing colours. The calm and serenity of Dar Najat is overwhelming  and gives you a sense of peace and tranquillity. Once you step out of the door you feel back to a former era with the echoing sounds of the Medina Jemaa el Fna and the hubbub of Marrakesh life.
After a busy day spent exploring the vibrant city, you will be happy to retire in the warm intimacy of your colourful and well-decorated room.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the medina, a walking distance from the souks, Riad Eden offers a patio with a fountain and a Moroccan living room. Guests are invited to the rooftop terrace which features a view of the Atlas Mountains or to the covered, furnished terrace.
The rooms are traditionally decorated and offer a view of the patio. You can rest on the seating area and the private bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.
A Moroccan breakfast is available every morning. Guests can also request a traditional meal. After breakfast, you can plan your excursions and daily activities on site.
The riad is situated 2.5 miles from Marrakech Airport and 1.2 miles from Marrakech Train Station. There is a public car park at a location nearby, available at a surcharge.

hotel_desc_summary:
Only a 15-minute walk to Jemaa El Fna Square, Riad Ajebel offers guest accommodation in a typically Moroccan, 11th-century building. A rooftop terrace with sunbeds, a hammam and massage rooms are at guests’ disposal.
The air-conditioned, individually themed guest rooms feature local, handcrafted furniture and free Wi-Fi access. All have a private bathroom with bathtub or shower and traditional berber carpets.
A Moroccan breakfast is provided daily at Riad Ajebel and may be enjoyed in the room or on the terrace. Shared meals with hosts featuring traditional, local meals, such as tagine and couscous, are also available.
With the Marrakech Airport only a 10-minute drive away, the property is a 7-minute walk to the Saadian Tombs.

hotel_desc_summary:
With a rooftop terrace and panoramic views of Marrakech’s Old Medina and the Atlas Mountains, this riad features an authentic Moroccan design. Guests can relax in the hammam or in the Spa or cool off in the plunge pool in the patio.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Riad Dar Nimbus are traditionally decorated with colourful Zellige tiles. All rooms have free Wi-Fi and an en suite bathroom, and some include a TV and a fireplace.
Moroccan cuisine can be enjoyed in the dining area or on the terrace, and a continental breakfast is served daily. The riad can organise on-site massages, babysitting and visits of the surrounding area.
The property is 1 miles from the Majorelle Garden and 2.5 miles from Bahia Palace. Marrakech – Menara Airport is a 15-minute drive away and an airport shuttle service is available upon demand.

Al Fassia, the internationally famous à la carte restaurant in Marrakech, has now developed its business further by opening this luxury hotel of the same name near the Aguedal gardens.
Al Fassia Aguedal boasts modern facilities, traditional architecture and magnificent views of the Atlas Mountains. The 3 patios with fountains give a feeling of space.
The guest rooms include free wired internet access, en suite facilities, satellite TV, minibar and a work desk.
During your stay, enjoy a candlelit meal in the restaurant. Savour regional Moroccan specialities prepared with fresh ingredients, and international wines. Free wired internet access is available in the public areas.
During your stay, stroll in the nearby gardens and visit the snow-peaked mountains. Just a short walk away you will find a cinema and shopping complex.

hotel_desc_summary:
Just a 2-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, this traditional riad offers a rooftop terrace and air-conditioned rooms with a Moroccan-style decor. It is located a 20-minute walk from Dar Si Saïd Museum and The Bahia Palace.
Guest rooms at Riad Abaka are individually decorated and equipped with heating. Each has an en suite bathroom with a shower and traditional Tadelakt walls.
Breakfast is served each morning at the riad and can be enjoyed on the terrace, or in the courtyard. For other meals, traditional Moroccan dishes are available on site.
Free Wi-Fi internet access is provided in the riad’s lounges and in the courtyard. Staff are available 24 hours a day and for a supplement they can organise an airport transfer or hammam treatments.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located a 5-minute walk from the Bahia Palace, this riad offers a rooftop sun terrace with a view of the Atlas Mountains and air-conditioned guestrooms with free Wi-Fi. Guests can sample traditional Moroccan cuisine during their stay.
Guest rooms at Dar Taliwint are colourful and decorated with Moroccan-style furnishings. They each have an en suite bathroom with complimentary toiletries and offer a balcony with views of the riad’s interior courtyard.
Breakfast is served daily and includes Moroccan pancakes, jams and breads. Other meals and free soft drinks can be enjoyed in the riad’s stylish dining room. Bottles of mineral water, fresh flowers, fruits or moroccan pastries are available in the bedroom.
A library is available to guests, as well as a courtyard patio where guests can relax. Staff are available at the riad 24 hours a day and sightseeing excursions can be organised on request.
The riad is located a 15-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square and The Dar Si Said Museum is just 350 feet away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Marrakech, Riad Swaka is just a 10-minute walk from Jemaâ El Fna Square and the souks. It offers a patio, a plunge pool, and a rooftop terrace. It is 650 feet from Dar Si Said Museum.
All of the rooms at Riad Swaka are uniquely decorated and have a view of the patio. Each room features air conditioning, a desk and a seating area. Each room also includes a private bathroom with tadelakt walls, a hairdryer and bathrobe.
A Moroccan breakfast is included and served every morning in the dining room. The hosts can also prepare traditional, Moroccan dishes for dinner, upon prior reservation and it is sometimes served on the terrace which overlooks the Palais Bahia gardens.
Free Wi-Fi is provided throughout the property. Massages, tattoos, poker, belly dancing and tour excursions can be organised and a concierge service is also available. Free private parking is possible on site and airport shuttles are available upon request.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Berrima district, 0.6 miles from El Bahia Palace and a 20-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, La Maison Rouge offers an outdoor swimming pool with a view of the palace. Hammam and massage treatments are available on site.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at La Maison Rouge  are stylishly decorated and equipped with free Wi-Fi internet access. Each room has an en suite bathroom offering a shower and a hairdryer.
A continental breakfast is served each morning. Moroccan and Mediterranean dishes are available upon request for lunch and dinner and served in the courtyard beside the orange trees.
During their stay guests are invited to relax on the rooftop terrace with sun loungers or enjoy a drink in the bar. Additional services available for a supplement include a laundry service, airport shuttle and sightseeing excursions.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located by the souks in the Medina and a 10-minute walk from Jamâa El Fna Square, Dar Titrit offers individually decorated rooms with air conditioning and free Wi-Fi access. The riad features a heated plunge pool and a rooftop terrace.
Each room has a view of the central patio, and includes a private bathroom fitted with a shower. There are several seating areas as well as a traditional lounge with a fireplace and a choice of books. A traditional breakfast is served daily and you can enjoy evening meals prepared on request.
Dar Titrit can organise airport transfers at an extra charge, and Marrakech Train Station is 2.5 miles away. The Ben Youssef Madrasa and museum is just a 5-minute walk from the property.

Breakfast is offered every morning and can be taken on the outdoor terrace. Guests can request Moroccan dishes and enjoy them on the long couches in the dining room.
Riad Amin has a massage room on site. An indoor swimming pool is next to the lounge areas in the inner courtyard.

Located in Medina, just a 5-minute walk from Jemaa El Fnaa Square, Riad 64 offers a rooftop terrace with Medina views, an outdoor swimming pool and sun loungers. It boasts a hammam and beauty centre. Majorelle Garden is 2.5 miles away.
All rooms are air-conditioned and feature views of the patio, a fireplace and safety deposit box, while some also offer a living room. The en suite bathroom includes tadelakt tiles, a hairdryer and free toiletries.
A breakfast is available daily and can be served on the patio, terrace or in the dining room. Guests can also sample Moroccan cuisine upon request.
Additional features include organisation of tour excursions and massages upon demand. Marrakech Menara Airport is ideally located a 10-minute drive from the riad.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Sirayane Boutique Hotel & Spa Marrakech
hotel_desc_summary:
Spread across nearly 5 acres of gardens, this boutique hotel is a 10 minute shuttle ride from Jemaâ El Fna Square and faces the Atlas Mountains. It offers luxury units, heated outdoor pools and a spa center.
Each air-conditioned room comes with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV with a DVD player and a private terrace or garden. A minibar is provided and some suites have a private pool.
Sirayane Boutique Hotel & Spa offers a steam bath and beauty and massage treatments. Guests are free to use the fitness room or the paddle tennis court and there is a library of books and DVDs.
The restaurant serves Moroccan and International specialties for lunch and dinner.  Guests can enjoy a cocktail in the bar while taking in views of the Atlas Mountains.
The hotel is a 10 minute drive from Marrakech-Menara Airport. A free shuttle bus to the Jemaâ El Fna Square runs 6 times per day. For guests with cars, free parking is offered on site.

hotel_desc_summary:
Featuring 3 swimming pools, including one on the rooftop terrace overlooking the Atlas Mountains, is this 5-star hotel with contemporary architecture. It is located a 15 minute drive from Marrakech Airport.
A balcony, minibar and free Wi-Fi access are provided in the air-conditioned rooms. Each luxurious room features a marble floor and an Espresso Crema coffee machine. The apartment also has a living room.
Moroccan and international cuisine are served in the stylish restaurant, and you can enjoy a drink in the bar by the pool. A continental breakfast is prepared every morning at Cesar Resort & Spa.
The spa offers a steam bath and sauna, and massages are available upon request. There is a 24-hour front desk and a concierge service.
The center of the city and the Royal Golf Club are 2 miles away.

In the heart of the old district of Dar Elbach, Riad Ambre Et Epices welcomes you to a former spice merchant's house renovated with respect for Moroccan tradition.
Discover 6 elegant rooms named after the most important stages of the Spice Route. For your comfort, all rooms are air-conditioned and equipped with full bathrooms.
Every detail at Riad Ambre Et Epices has been designed for your relaxation. Idle time away in the Riad's hammam, massage lounge, swimming pool or hot tub, unless you prefer to unwind in the solarium or on the terrace among friends.
In the afternoon, free tea and Moroccan pastries are served at the Riad.
One free transfer from the airport to the hotel is available for guests staying 3 nights or more.

Surrounded by palm groves in a 3-hectare park, the Murano blends contemporary design with traditional Moroccan architecture. Admire luxurious gardens, the Atlas Mountains and the desert from your spacious terrace.

The Laurence Olivier offers 5-star accommodation in central Marrakesh. It has a hammam, a luxury spa and health centre and a rooftop garden and terrace, with views of the city.
The Riad has an Arab-Andalusian design and each individually styled room and suite has air-conditioning and heating, a large private bathroom and free Wi-Fi internet.
Guests of the Riad Laurence Olivier can enjoy a selection of International and Moroccan cuisine. Meals can be enjoyed in the dining room, on the patio or on the terrace offering panoramic views of the city and Atlas Mountains.
Situated close to numerous cafes, restaurants and night clubs the Riad Laurence Olivier also offers a wide selection of teas and Moroccan pastries, served throughout the day.
Guests can enjoy the swimming pool, which is in the garden. The Laurence Olivier can also arrange a private car with chauffeur for airport transfers or excursions.
Guests of the Laurence Olivier can enjoy access to 3 golf courses located within 1.2 miles; The Royal Golf, Amelkis Golf Course and Al Maaden Golf Course. Marrakesh Train Station is just 1.2 miles from the hotel.

The rooms are decorated in a Moroccan style and offer a view of the patio. The private bathroom in all of them includes a hairdryer.
A Moroccan breakfast is provided every morning. You can also enjoy a drink at the bar or request a local meal, available upon reservation.
Other facilities include massage treatments and a steam bath, at a surcharge and a tour desk. Guests can relax in one of the living rooms which offer a fireplace or the TV. Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas.
The accommodation is a 13-minute walk from Medersa Ben Youssef and Marrakech Museum. The train station is 2.1 miles away.

You can enjoy the continental breakfast in the patio, which is equipped with a seating area. Moroccan specialties and children’s menus are proposed for dinner and can also be taken on the terrace.
Medersa Ben Youssef is a 10-minute walk from Riad Soundouss and Jemâa El Fna Square is a 20-minute walk away. Marrakech Airport is a 15-minute drive away and the Majorelle Garden is a 20-minute walk away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Tchaikana is located in the centre of Marrakech, at the heart of the Medina, offering a sun terrace with views of the Medina. The elegant, individually decorated guest rooms have ceiling fans and free Wi-Fi access is provided.
Each room includes an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries. The rooms are set around a central patio with a seating area. A continental breakfast is served daily, and you can enjoy traditional dishes for other meals on request.
Massages and a hammam can be organised from Riad Tchaikana at an extra charge. Other services include camel or horse riding, quad biking and trekking. The Koutoubia Mosque and gardens are a 20-minute walk away.

Riad Meriem is located in Marrakech just a 10-minute walk from Jemaa El Fna Square and a 5-minute walk away from the Ben Youssef Medersa. Guests can relax by the patio pool or in the lounge with a fireplace.
The rooms at Riad Meriem are individually decorated in a Moroccan style in grey and violet tones. Each room is air conditioned and offers a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a bath or shower.

hotel_desc_summary:
Villa des Orangers offers luxurious accommodation in a former palace located in the centre of Marrakech, just a 5-minute walk from Jemaa el Fna Square. It features 3 patios with orange trees and swimming pools and includes a wellness centre.
Each air-conditioned room is equipped with a minibar, free Wi-Fi access and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Every room has a private bathroom with twin washbasins, a bathtub and a separate shower. Some include a private terrace.
Breakfast is served daily and a bar is open 24 hours a day serving free, non-alcoholic drinks. You can also enjoy Mediterranean style cuisine at the restaurant. Lunch can be served by the pool, on the terraces or on the shaded patio.
Villa des Orangers has a hammam, a beauty salon, massage booths and a fitness room. A variety of traditional beauty treatments are on offer.

Free Wi-Fi is accessible in each room with a private bathroom, where guests can relax on the balcony. All rooms at the Red Hotel Marrakech have modern decor, a flat-screen TV and air conditioning.
A buffet breakfast is available each morning. After sampling international cuisine on the restaurant’s terrace, guests can relax with a drink in the lobby bar or the lounge bar, which also features a terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available in the lobby.
This hotel with a 24-hour front desk provides free parking and a laundry service. It is just over a quarter mile from the convention center, a 6-minute drive from Jamaâ El Fna Square and a 20-minute walk from the 12th-century Menara Gardens.

hotel_desc_summary:
Featuring a garden, Villa TC offers pet-friendly accommodations in Marrakesh. The property features a private pool, a spa tub and a sauna. Metro Shopping (Marrakech) is 9 miles away. Free private parking is available on site.
All units feature a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units include a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven and toaster. A refrigerator and kettle are also provided. There is a private bathroom with a bathtub and slippers in each unit. Bed linen are available.
Villa TC also includes a spa center and hammam. Guests can enjoy a meal at the on-site restaurant. The property also has grocery deliveries.
Bike rental and car rental are available at the property and the area is popular for horseback riding and hiking. Museum Dar Si Said is 11 miles from Villa TC. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 12 miles from Villa TC.

hotel_desc_summary:
The Semiramis is in 10 acre park planted with palm trees, just 10 minutes from the Jamaâ El Fna Square. It features an outdoor swimming pool and a spa.
Decorated in traditional Moroccan colors, the guest rooms at Semiramis are spacious and have a private balcony. Each is air-conditioned and has free Wi-Fi access and satellite TV.
Le Chellah restaurant serves traditional cuisine. Next to the swimming pool, both La Strada and L’Oasis serve Mediterranean dishes. The hotel’s Bar Aladin opens onto the landscaped grounds and serves a range of drinks.
Additional facilities at Semiramis include a meeting room, fitness center and spa with a steam bath and massages.  Guests may also play tennis or volleyball and dance the night away in the nightclub.
The hotel is easily accessed from Marrakesh International Airport, 15 minutes away. The center of the city is a 10 minute drive away and private parking is free on site.

hotel_desc_detail:
Riad Nasreen is located in the heart of Marrakech’s Medina (historic quarter) near the Dar El Bacha Palace. It offers a restaurant, patio and hammam. Free Wi-Fi is available.
Nasreen rooms are air-conditioned and the bathrooms are decorated with traditional zellige and tadelakt tiles. All of the rooms have a view of or direct access to the interior patio.
Nasreen’s restaurant serves traditional Moroccan cuisine. Guests can dine on the interior patio that is filled with plants and flowers.
Guests are invited to relax on Riad Nasreen’s terrace, which overlooks the Kotobia Mosque and Atlas Mountains. The riad has a traditional hammam and massage room. A variety of beauty and relaxation treatments are available upon request.

hotel_desc_summary:
Featuring a garden, Palmeraie Village 2 is located in Marrakesh, just 2.8 miles from Metro Shopping (Marrakech). There is a bowling alley on site and guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant. Museum des Amis de Marrakech is 3.7 miles away. Free private parking is available on site.
The accommodation is equipped with a sitting and dining area. Some units have a terrace and/or balcony with pool or garden views. There is also a kitchen, fitted with an oven. A microwave and refrigerator are also provided, as well as a coffee machine. There is a private bathroom with free toiletries in each unit. Bed linen are available.
Palmeraie Village 2 also includes a spa center and hot tub. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant which has grocery deliveries available on request.
Bike rental is available at the property and the area is popular for golfing and horseback riding. Museum Dar Si Said is 3.9 miles from Palmeraie Village 2, and Palais de La Bahia is 4 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 6 miles from the property.

The air-conditioned guest rooms are elegantly decorated and offer a view of the patio. Some rooms have a balcony, and guests are free to watch satellite TV or relax by the fireplace in one of the shared lounge areas.
Traditional Moroccan cuisine and international dishes are proposed in the dining room at Riad Dar Karma. Breakfast is served daily on the patio, on one of the terraces or in the comfort of guest rooms. 24-hour room service is available.
A hammam, massage treatments and a library are available on site. The property is just 5 minutes’ walk from the Saadian Tombs, 0.7 miles from Jemaâ El Fna Square and 0.9 miles from Bahia Palace.

hotel_desc_summary:
A 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna, Riad Helen is a 15-minute drive from Marrakech Menara Airport. It offers a sun terrace, a patio with a fountain and a lounge with a fireplace.
Individually decorated in a Moroccan style, the rooms at Riad Helen have an en suite Tadelakt bathroom complete with free toiletries and a shower. Individual heating is also provided.
A continental breakfast is served daily. For other meals, you can try Moroccan dishes on the patio, the terrace or by the fireplace in the dining room.
Situated in the Dar El Bacha district, the Riad is an 8-minute walk from Koutoubia Mosque, and excursions and guided tours can be organised at an extra cost.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Bab Doukkala district of the city, just a 4-minute walk from the medina’s 12th-century gate, this stylish riad offers air-conditioned rooms and a plunge pool. Jamaâ El Fna Square is a 5-minute drive away.
Each of the elegantly decorated guest rooms offers a marble en suite bathroom with complimentary bathrobes and bath products. All rooms have a seating area, an iPod docking station and free Wi-Fi access.
Breakfast is served each morning and can be enjoyed by the fountain in the courtyard. For other meals, the riad offers a variety of Moroccan inspired dishes prepared with fresh produce from the Bab Doukkala food souk.
Guests are invited to relax in an air-conditioned guest lounge offering a flat-screen TV, CD player and a selection of books. A rooftop terrace with a Berber-style tent and a shaded seating area is also available.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the historic centre of the medina, the magnificent and luminous Ryad Talaa 12 recently renovated for a traditional feel in a simple, sober and contemporary setting.
Offering a striking contrast between the animation of the medina and the serenity of a palace, the 600 m² Ryad Talaa 12 was recently renovated. It boasts numerous b'hous (open lounges) and large terraces looking out over the souks and offering a 360° view of the snow-covered peaks of the Atlas mountains.
Ryad Talaa 12 features a massage area and a traditional hammam. Come and discover an ancient rite and make your stay a moment of pure relaxation.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Adam Park Marrakech Hotel & Spa
hotel_desc_summary:
A 15-minute walk from the Agdal Gardens, this hotel serves a daily breakfast, and has an outdoor pool and free Wi-Fi. It features several restaurants which serve a variety of cuisine, including an Art Deco restaurant and one with terrace dining.
Each room at the Adam Park Marrakech Hotel & Spa is air-conditioned and has a patio or balcony with a view of the surrounding area. All rooms have private bathrooms and include a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
Guests can choose between the Traviata restaurant, with Italian music and specialties served on the terrace with a pool view; Sidibibi restaurant, serving Moroccan specialties; the contemporary-styled XS restaurant or the Art Deco-styled L’international, both serving international specialties.
After a work-out on the cardio machines in the fitness center, guests can relax with a body treatment.
The Jamaâ El Fna Square is a 10-minute drive from this hotel, and the El Badi Palace is a 7-minute drive away. The hotel is 4 miles from the Royal Golf Course and a 20-minute drive from Marrakech Menara Airport. 


Agdal is a great choice for travelers interested in 
, 
 and 
.

hotel_desc_summary:
Showcasing an outdoor pool and sun terrace, Hôtel Racine is located in Marrakesh. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.
All rooms are equipped with a TV. Some accommodations feature a sitting area to relax in after a busy day. Every room comes with a private bathroom. For your comfort, you will find free toiletries and a hairdryer.
There is a hairdresser's at the property.
The hotel also provides bike rental and car rental. Stadium is 0.4 miles from Hôtel Racine, and Marrakech Parking Koutoubia is 0.7 miles away. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 2.5 miles from the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Medina of Marrakech, Dar Assiya is a 10-minute walk from Jemaâ El Fna Square and a 10-minute drive from Marjorelle Garden. It offers a central patio, a furnished terrace and a plunge pool.
All of the rooms at Dar Assiya are heated, air-conditioned and traditionally decorated. Each room features a private bathroom with shower and some of the rooms have a seating area.
A typical, Moroccan breakfast is served each morning in the dining room.
Free Wi-Fi is provided in common areas. Transfers, excursions and tours in the area can be organised, upon prior reservation. Public parking is possible near the Riad, with an additional cost, and Marrakech Menara Airport is 5.6 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
The Pavillon du Golf aparthotel is set in a peaceful garden, in Marrakesh Palm Grove. It features an outdoor pool and a 27-hole golf course.
Each apartment at the Le Pavillon du Golf has a balcony with panoramic views over the golf course and Atlas Mountains. The air-conditioned and elegant apartments have satellite TV and a private bathroom.
The Pavillon Du Golf’s gourmet restaurant, Pasta Cosy, serves Italian cuisine. You can sample it on the large terrace which offers views of the pool and the lake.
Guests also have access to the Palmeraie Golf Palace's facilities, located next door. There are activities such as quad rental as well as access to the golf course, at a surcharge.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the medina (historic quarter), just a 7-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, is the Dar Les Cigognes By Sansouci Collection. Exotic trees are planted on the rooftop terrace, where you can enjoy a continental breakfast.
The luxurious guest rooms are decorated with carved wood furniture and they offer a view of the patio. Some rooms feature an original fireplace and a sitting area. Free Wi-Fi access is provided.
Moroccan cuisine is served for dinner in the award-winning restaurant, and you can dine on the terrace. The property also offers cookery classes by experienced teachers and you can relax in the hammam or request a massage after dinner. The treatments use Argan-oil based products.
Additional services include beauty treatments and the staff can arrange excursions and activities. Bahia Palace is a 10-minute walk away, the Saadian Tombs are a 3-minute walk away, the Badi Palace is across from the property and Marrakech Airport is just 4 miles away. 


Mellah is a great choice for travelers interested in

 and 
.

hotel_desc_summary:
This Riad is located in central Marrakesh, a short walk from the Djemaa el Fna. It has 2 outdoor pools, one is heated, a traditional Moroccan courtyard and two outdoor terraces.
Each of the Riad’s guest rooms is air-conditioned and has a private bathroom and free Wi-Fi. They are all set around the courtyard and feature traditional Moroccan upholstery.
Guests of the Riad can relax in the hammam and enjoy a refreshing drink on the terrace or in the comfortable lounge. Regional specialties can be made to order by the Riad’s chef.
An airport shuttle is available. Guests can enjoy visits to the Koutoubia Mosque, the Medina and the numerous traditional Markets and restaurants which surround the hotel.

The air-conditioned guest rooms and suites at Riad Zehar open onto the patio and feature a traditional Moroccan décor. The suites have a whirlpool bathtub, and guests have access to a communal TV lounge.
Breakfast is served every morning in Zehar’s restaurant or on the terrace. On warm days, guests can relax with a drink from the bar in the sunshine and use the free Wi-Fi.

In Marrakech’s Medina, a 5-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square and Kotoubia Mosque, this air-conditioned Riad features a rooftop terrace with sunbeds, a small pool and views of the local area. It proposes a hammam and massages.
Free Wi-Fi is accessible from each room and suite at Riad Mouna. Decorated with elements of Moroccan design, all include a private bathroom and suites also have a seating area with a flat-screen TV.
Each morning a continental breakfast is provided, and half-board options are available. You can try Moroccan cuisine in the dining room or by the fountain on the patio. Other services include organising excursions and tours.
The Riad is a 15-minute walk from Ben Youssef Madrasa. Marrakech Menara Airport is 15 minutes’ drive and Marrakech Train Station is a 10-minute drive.  The Bahia and El Badi Palaces are 2,300 feet away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Zahir is situated in the heart of Marrakech’s Old Medina, just a 10-minute walk from Jemaâ El Fna Square and the Koutoubia. The traditionally designed riad offers a patio with palm trees, setaing areas and a plunge pool.
The air-conditioned guest rooms feature a traditional décor and a view of the patio. They each include a seating area and a private bathroom with a shower.
Breakfast is served every morning at Riad Zahir, and guests are invited to relax on the property’s sun terrace. Transfers, tours and excursions can be organised upon request.
Marrakech-Menara Airport is a 30-minute drive from the riad and Marrakech Train Station is a 10-minute drive away. The property is a 15-minute walk from Bahia Palace.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Medina, a 5-minute walk from Jamaa l' Fna Square, Riad Ecila offers a steam bath, a traditional patio and a terrace. You can rest in the traditionally-decorated living room using free Wi-Fi access, also available in the patio.
The traditional-style rooms at Riad Ecila provide a direct access to the patio. The private bathroom includes free toiletries and a hairdryer.
 A Moroccan breakfast is provided every morning. You can also request a traditional meal and sample it in the dining area of the guest house.
You can also get a haircut on site or organize your airport transfer, at an additional cost.
The Marrakech Airport is a 20-minute drive away. The property is also a 15-minute drive from Marrakech Train Station.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Riad Laarouss district of Marrakech medina, just a 10-minute walk from Place Jamaâ El Fna Square, this traditional guesthouse offers air-conditioned rooms and 2 rooftop terraces with Berber tents.
Guest rooms at Dar Soukaina have a Moroccan decor and open onto a patio area. Each room has an en suite bathroom with a shower and offers free Wi-Fi internet access.
Breakfast is included in the price and is served on the patio when the weather is nice. For other meals, guests are invited to sample traditional Moroccan dishes.
A lounge with a fireplace leads onto a garden with banana and orange trees and a TV lounge is also available.
Additional facilities available at the guesthouse include a 24-hour reception desk and luggage storage.

In Marrakech, Villa Malika Silvana offers a restaurant. These independent accommodations features free Wi-Fi. The property is 2.5 miles from Palais Royal Marrakech and just under 3 miles from Saadian Tombs.
Accommodation includes a TV, air conditioning and a balcony. There is a kitchen with a dishwasher and a microwave. Featuring a spa tub, shared bathrooms also come with a shower and a bathtub. You can enjoy lake view and mountain view.
At Villa Malika Silvana, there is an airport shuttle, a garden and a terrace. Other facilities like a shared lounge are offered. The property provides free parking.
If you feel like exploring the surrounding area, check out Moulay El Yazid Mosque (2 miles away) and Bahia Palace (3 miles away). Marrakech-Menara Airport is located 4 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Marrakech’s medina, Riad Noga is a 5-minute walk from Bahia Palace and a 10-minute walk from Jemaa El Fna Square. It features an outdoor swimming pool, furnished terraces and patios.
Offering views of the pool and patios, the air-conditioned rooms are all equipped with en suite facilities including a bathrobe, hairdryer, shower and slippers. Most of the rooms also have an LCD TV with satellite channels.
Breakfast is served every morning at the riad. Meals featuring Moroccan and Mediterranean specialties can be prepared upon request. Guests have access to rooftop, furnished terraces with panoramic views of the city and mountains.
Free Wi-Fi is available. Guests can arrange excursions at this property, while Medersa Ben Youssef is a 15-minute walk away. Marrakesh Menara Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_summary:
This traditional Moroccan guest house is in the heart of Marrakech, close to Jamaâ El Fna Square. It features 2 terraces with panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains.
Each air-conditioned room and suite is designed in a typical Moroccan style.  They have authentic antique furniture and private bathrooms with shower or bath.
Riad L Harmattan restaurant serves traditional Moroccan cuisine, and also a selection from their wine cellar.  After a meal guests can relax in the lounge with fireplace with free tea and coffee provided.
Harmattan can organise excursions such as cultural tours of Marrakech.  There are also activities in the hotel such as cooking classes, massages and solarium.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located a 5-minute drive from Palmeraie Golf Club, Palais de l’O has an outdoor swimming pool, a hammam and a hot tub. You can sample a dish from the traditional restaurant or enjoy a drink from the bar.
The en suite rooms at Palais de l’O are decorated in a modern and traditional style. They have a balcony with a view of the large garden and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels.
A snack bar is available on site and a continental and Moroccan breakfast can brought to the seating area of your room. After lunch, you can request a massage treatment, at an additional cost.
Other facilities include sunbeds, a fountain and a sun terrace. Ironing services as well as laundry service are provided.
It is a 15-minute drive from Medina & Jamaa El Fna square and from the train station. Marrakech Airport is a 20-minute drive away.

The rooms and suites at Riad Safar have a traditional decor and views onto the interior patio. Air-conditioned, all have a seating area and some feature a separate lounge.
A continental breakfast is provided every morning in the living room or in the comfort of guest rooms. You can also sample Moroccan specialties (upon request) beside the fountain on the patio or on the terrace.
Free Wi-Fi access in public areas and massages are also on offer at this riad. Dar El Bacha Palace is a 5-minute walk away or you may also visit the Majorelle Gardens, a 7-minute drive from the property.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at Le Palais Rhoul and Spa
hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Palmerie district, just 3.1 miles from Marrakech, Le Palais Rhoul and Spa offers luxury accommodation with 2 outdoor swimming pools, hammam, hot tub and massage treatments.
All rooms are air-conditioned and some feature a balcony with views of the pool and garden, a seating area, flat-screen TV, safety deposit box and fireplace. The en suite bathroom includes a bathrobe, hairdryer and free toiletries.
A continental breakfast is available each morning at Le Palais Rhoul and Spa. The on-site restaurant serves international specialities and guests can relax in the bar with a drink.
Additional features include a Moroccan lounge, organisation of tour excursions, library and indoor plunge pool. Marrakech-Menara Airport is ideally located a 30-minute drive away.

Elegant, simple and calm, the Maison Belbaraka offers comfortable accommodations. Guest rooms are individually decorated and tastefully furnished with private bathrooms.
Get the day off to a good start with the free continental breakfast. In the evening, the you can savor Moroccan specialties prepared with fresh local ingredients.
Relax on the pleasant patio and flowered terrace. Enjoy the solarium and the panoramic view of the Koutoubia minaret and the Grand Atlas Mountains.
The Belbaraka offers free Wi-Fi and there is also a public computer available with internet access.

All of the suites are air conditioned and equipped with an en suite bathroom with a bath or shower. They are decorated in a modern Moroccan style and overlook the patio.
A continental breakfast is served daily and Moroccan cuisine is available upon advanced request. Drinks can be enjoyed in the bar and tea is served in the Moroccan salon. There is also a European salon with a fireplace.

hotel_desc_summary:
Set in the heart of the Medina of Marrakech and a 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, the Riad Louaya offers a cosy setting and carefully crafted interior design near the Dar El Bacha district.
The Riad is a characterful house that offers a home-from-home feeling and 4 rooms spread over 2 floors. The rooms present traditionally decorated and cosy spaces.
The B’Hou, a traditional lounge, opens onto the lovely patio planted with orange and mandarin trees. It is decorated with a marble fountain and fine Moroccan woodwork.
The rooftop terrace offers a spectacular view of the Medina and a comfortable setting for your Moroccan breakfasts and dinners. It also offers a relaxing shaded lounge where you can enjoy mint tea.
From the Riad Louaya, via the antique dealers’ street, you are at 1,000 feet walk from the souks and Marrakech Museum.

Riad Dar More is located in the heart of Marrakech, a 5-minute walk from the Jamaâ El Fna Square. Set within a traditional Moroccan building, it offers contemporary rooms and a rooftop terrace.
Each of the guest rooms is uniquely decorated and includes air conditioning, free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom.
The Riad serves a daily breakfast and snacks and meals are available upon request.  Guests can relax with a drink on the rooftop terrace overlooking the Atlas Mountains or in the solarium.
In addition to a 24-hour reception, Riad Dar More also provides an airport shuttle service.

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated in the heart of Marrakesh, this hotel is just a 10-minute drive from the famous Jaam El Fenaa square. It features an outdoor swimming pool, spa and fitness centre.
Guestrooms at Diwane Hotel are decorated in warm authentic colours. They are spacious and come with free Wi-Fi, a flat-screen TV and private bathroom.

The Diwane restaurant serves Moroccan and international cuisine.

Uniquely decorated, all rooms include air conditioning, satellite TV, a seating area and a wardrobe. The en suite bathroom offers tadelakt walls and a hairdryer.
A continental breakfast is provided and Moroccan and international food can be served upon request. Guests can also enjoy a drink in the bar or on the terrace, which offers views of Atlas Mountain and Koutoubia Minaret.
Additional facilities include a lounge with a TV and chimney. The property is a 5-minute walk from Marrakesh Museum and it is ideally located just 4.3 miles from Marrakesh Menara Airport.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Oumaima is a palace-style guest house, a 10-minute walk through the souks to Jamaâ El Fna Square. It offers an interior patio with a heated plunge pool and a rooftop sun terrace.
A typical Moorish decoration and a lounge area are standard facilities in the rooms at Oumaima. Each is air-conditioned and features Wi-Fi access.
Cuisine at Oumaima includes Moroccan pastries, mint tea and traditional tagines. On sunny days guests can dine or relax with a drink on the terrace overlooking the Atlas Mountains.
Additional facilities include a spa with massage facilities. A shuttle service to and from Marrakech Menara Airport can also be organised at the guest house’s 24-hour reception.

With a Moroccan-style décor, all the air-conditioned rooms feature views of the patio and a bathroom with a shower.
A Moroccan breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Riad Magellan. Moroccan dishes are also served on request. Riad Magellan Yoga and Spa features a courtyard with a plunge pool.
Cooking lessons, massage treatments, airport transfers and excursions can be arranged at the property under extra fees. The Marrakech-Menara Airport is 4.3 miles away and public parking can be found nearby at an extra cost.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad La Croix Berbere is located 350 feet from the Jamaâ El Fna Square. It provides air-conditioned rooms with a TV, private bathroom and Tadelakt wall decoration. It has a pool and a roof terrace.
La Croix Berbere serves traditional Moroccan cuisine including dishes such as couscous, tagines and pastillas. Guests are invited to dine on the riad’s terrace or have a BBQ under the pergola.
Guests have access to the swimming pool, which is found in the centre of the patio, or the roof terrace with deck chairs. Some of Croix Berbere’s rooms overlook the pool and patio.
Free Wi-Fi is available in common areas and in some of the rooms. Le Riad La Croix Berbère provides airport transfers upon request.

The riad offers easy access to the medina and all the attractions of Marrakech. After an exciting day in the medina, relax by the fireplace in the lounge or in the sun on the terrace. The riad also offers massages and beauty treatments and features a hammam.

hotel_desc_summary:
This authentic Berber house is ideally located 30 minutes from the lively Jamaâ El Fna Square, the main square of Marrakesh. It also offers a magnificent sight on the Atlas Mountains.
Dar Tifawine offers traditional and modern 6 rooms and 1 caïdale style suite, all equipped with air conditioning and a modern en suite bathroom.
Guests are invited to enjoy a moment of rest by the swimming pool in the garden. Dar Tifawine also has a spa with a hydrotherapy bath, a traditional hammam and a massage room.
An in-house chef prepares a wide range of international and Moroccan specialities.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Palmier’s air-conditioned rooms overlook an interior patio with palm trees. The riad has a terrace, solarium, and free Wi-Fi throughout the hotel.
Each Riad Palmier room has a private bathroom with shower. Some rooms have a private balcony.
Guests are invited to relax on Palmier’s rooftop terrace, which has a sunbathing area and hammam. The terrace offers excellent views of the Badii Palace. There are also two sitting rooms, one indoor and the other outdoor.
Riad Palmier is located in Marrakech’s medina. It is walking distance from the Tinsmiths’ Square, tombs of the Saadian kings and the Kasbah district.

hotel_desc_summary:
With views of the Medina’s rooftops, this Riad features air conditioning, 2 terraces and a patio with an illuminated pool. It's just over a quarter mile from Jamaâ El Fna Square and organizes themed evenings with musicians and dancers.
Free Wi-Fi is available in each suite, which are individually decorated in a traditional Moroccan style. Each has a private bathroom a patio or a balcony and some have Medina views.

Excursions to places such as Essaouira, the Ourika Valley, and the Ouzoud Waterfalls are available at additional cost, as well as an airport shuttle service.

hotel_desc_summary:
A 10-minute walk from Jamaa El Fna, Dar Rocmarra is set in a typically Moroccan building. A panoramic rooftop terrace with sun beds and cold shower and free Wi-Fi in public areas are some of the on-site facilities.
Featuring views of the furnished patio shaded by olive trees, the rooms include a private bathroom with Tadelakt walls. Some have a separate seating area and open onto a terrace.
A daily breakfast is provided at Dar Rocmarra. After breakfast, you can relax in the guest lounge with fireplace or explore local markets, which are a 2-minute walk away. Moroccan dishes and wines are also available upon request.
Marrakech Train Station and Marrakech Airport are both 2 and 2.5 miles from the B&B. Staff can help organise airport transfers and guided tours, and assist with local sights and recommendations.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the heart of the Marrakesh Palm Groves, this country villa is 6 miles from the Royal Golf Club. It features an outdoor swimming pool in its landscaped garden and lounges, which combine Moroccan and Senegalese décor.
You may also choose to relax in the library, play tennis or book a massage at this guesthouse. Additional activities include cooking classes with the on-site chef, using spices directly from Jamaâ el Fna Square.
The rooms at Jnane Tamsna are decorated with antiques and homemade accessories. In 5 different houses, they also provide views of the grounds, palm grove and the snow-capped Atlas Mountains.
A buffet breakfast is provided every morning in the lounges or on the terrace. The restaurant also offers North African cuisine, made from organic and home-grown ingredients where possible.
Free Wi-Fi is available in public areas and private parking is available on site. The center of Marrakesh is a 20 minute drive from the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in central Marrakech, this hotel is a 10-minute drive from the famous Jamaa El Fna. It features an outdoor pool and a heated, indoor one, a sauna, a fitness room and hammam. An airport shuttle is available upon request.
Most of air-conditioned rooms and suites have a balcony. Some of the rooms offer a hot tub, a four-poster bed and a marble bathroom. All of the rooms have satellite TV.
Le Mont-Royal restaurant serves international and Moroccan cuisine. Sample cocktails on the Imperial Holiday’s rooftop terrace with panoramic views over Marrakech. Relax in The Niagara Falls pool-side bar or enjoy the on-site entertainment.
The 24-hour reception hotel is a 2-minute walk from Marrakech Plaza shopping centre. Menara Airport is a 15-minute drive away and an shuttle is available upon reservation.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the heart of the medina, just 1,950 feet from Jamaâ El Fna Square, this riad offers a rooftop sun terrace with panoramic views over the old city.  After a day’s sightseeing, guests can enjoy complimentary mint tea and pastries by the courtyard’s fountain.
Guest rooms have a colourful Moroccan décor and an en suite bathroom decorated with traditional Tadelakt walls. All rooms are equipped with free Wi-Fi internet access and some offer a seating area where guests can relax.
Fresh orange juice, Moroccan pancakes and French toast are among some of the options available for breakfast, which is served throughout the morning. Homemade Moroccan and French fusion cuisine is offered for lunch and dinner.
The Dar Si Said Museum and The Bahia Palace are both a 10-minute walk from the riad. Marrakech Menara International Airport is a 15-minute drive away and the city’s central train station can be reached in 10 minutes by car.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Medina neighborhood in Marrakesh, 1,300 feet from Museum des Amis de Marrakech, Riad Palais Blanc features a year-round outdoor pool, barbecue and sun terrace. There is a restaurant and bar and guests can have fun at the water park.
Every room comes with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Some units have a sitting area for your convenience. Certain rooms include views of the pool or garden. The rooms are equipped with a private bathroom fitted with a bidet and shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and free toiletries.
There is a 24-hour front desk at the property.
Guests can enjoy various activities in the area, including skiing, golfing and hiking. The hotel also provides car rental. Museum Dar Si Said is half a mile from Riad Palais Blanc, and Palais de La Bahia is 0.6 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 3.1 miles from Riad Palais Blanc.

This traditional Moroccan guesthouse is in Marrakesh’s Medina district, a short walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It has a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains.
At the Andalouse guests can relax on the interior patio, which features a plunge-pool and a alounge area. There is also a hammam, and massage treatments are available.
Riad Andalouse offers air-conditioned rooms and suites with typical Moroccan features and private bathrooms. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all rooms.
The riad serves typical Moroccan cuisine and guests can enjoy a drink in the private bar. Additional facilities include a 24-hour reception and a tour desk.
Unlike many guesthouses in Marrakesh, the Riad Andalouse has direct car access. Both the Royal Golf and the Golf Amelkis golf courses are a 10-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Dar R’Mane is set in Marrakech’s Medina, just a 5-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, and offers a solarium and a terrace with a view on the Koutoubia Mosque. Guests can relax on the patio or by the fireplace in the lounge.
The air-conditioned guest rooms are decorated in a traditional Moroccan style and include a seating area. The en suite bathroom is fitted with a shower and free toiletries. Free Wi-Fi access is available in all rooms.
Moroccan dishes can be served in the dining area upon request and a Moroccan breakfast is prepared every morning. Dar R’Mane can help organise visits and excursions in the city and surroundings and golf courses can be found within 6.2 miles.
The property is a 20-minute drive from Marrakech Menara Airport and a 15-minute walk from Bahia Palace. The Majorelle Gardens are 1.6 miles away and the Marrakech Museum is only a 10-minute walk away. There is a public car park at a location nearby, available at a surcharge.

Riad El Noujoum is a luxurious riad located in the heart of Marrakesh Medina. It is a 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square and offers a rooftop terrace with views of the city.
Guest rooms at the Riad El Noujoum are air-conditioned and spacious. They include heating, safe, and bathrooms decorated with traditional Moroccan “tadlakt” tiles and marble.
Regional specialities are served in the on-site restaurant and room service is available. The Noujoum provides a heated swimming pool, a peaceful patio with fountain and several lounge areas.

This luxurious hotel offers modern rooms with balconies overlooking the hotel’s large outdoor pool or garden. It is a 5-minute drive from the center of Marrakech.
All guest rooms at the Hotel Tichka are air-conditioned with flat-screen TVs and minibars. Each room opens up to a terrace and includes a telephone and a private bathroom.
Tichka has 2 restaurants. Guests can enjoy international cuisine at the Ambar or typical Moroccan cuisine at the Johara. There is also a bar and a snack bar, and room service is available all day.
The hotel features a hammam, and massage treatments are also available. On-site facilities include an ATM machine and a currency exchange. Laundry and dry cleaning services are also provided.

Set around the central patio, the rooms at Riad Amani feature Moroccan accessories made by local craftsmen. They have tadelakt paint on the walls and free toiletries in the en suite bathroom.
A continental breakfast is provided every morning and served in the guest rooms, on the patio or in the lounges. The hosts can also prepare traditional specialties upon request.
Free Wi-Fi access and luggage storage are additional facilities at the riad. You can also organise excursions at the 24-hour reception or visit the Majorelle Gardens and Koutoubia Mosque, both a 20-minute walk away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Awa is a luxurious property with a rooftop terrace featuring a pool and shaded seating area, located a 2-minute walk from the Saadiens Tombs. A continental breakfast is included and you can relax in the hammam.
A seating area and air conditioning feature in the stylish rooms and suites, which are decorated with a mix of traditional Moroccan and contemporary furniture. Each has a bathrobe, hairdryer and free toiletries in the bathroom.
Moroccan dishes can be served upon request, and you will dine either on the terrace or in the dining room. After dinner, you can request a massage or relax beside the fireplace in the lounge.
Jamaâ El Fna Square is a 6-minute drive from this riad and Marrakech Train Station is an 11-minute drive away. The property is only an 18-minute drive from Marrakech Menara Airport.

hotel_desc_summary:
Showcasing a spa center and sauna, Riad Des Nations is located in the Medina neighborhood in Marrakesh. The guesthouse has a barbecue and hammam, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar.
A flat-screen TV, as well as a laptop are provided. Certain units have a sitting area to relax in after a busy day. A balcony or patio are featured in certain rooms. All rooms come with a private bathroom equipped with a bathtub or shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes, free toiletries and a hairdryer.
You will find a 24-hour front desk, a shared kitchen, hairdresser's and gift shop at the property.
The guesthouse also provides bike rental and car rental. Museum Dar Si Said is a few steps from Riad Des Nations, and Palais de La Bahia is 350 feet from the property. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 3.1 miles from the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
This guesthouse enjoys a privileged position in the Marrakesh Medina, only a 3-minute walk from the Jamaâ El Fna Square. It offers a swimming pool, terrace and free Wi-Fi access.
Each air-conditioned room at the Dar Choumissa has traditional décor and features a private bathroom.
Under the Berber tent, Dar Choumissa serves traditional Moroccan cuisine with seasonal produce. A typically Moroccan breakfast is served daily including home-made bread and jams.
Choumissa has a covered terrace where guests can relax, drink mint tea or read from the library.
Its central location allows guests to have an authentic Marrakesh dwelling, close by is the El Badi Palace, Bahia Palace,  the Cyber Parc Moulay Abdeslam and the Saadiens tombs.

Situated within the medina in Marrakech, this guest house is just a 15-minute walk from the square and market place of Jamaa El Fna. It offers air-conditioned guest rooms around a traditional courtyard with a swimming pool.
The light and airy guest rooms at Riad Zenithya feature traditional Moroccan carving and furnishings. Each has a balcony or direct access to the central courtyard. The private bathrooms include toiletries and a hairdryer.
Breakfast is offered daily and can be taken in the courtyard beside the plunge pool. Moroccan and French dishes can be cooked to order by the Zenithya’s chef.

Located 15 minutes drive from Marrakech Airport, Coco Canel can arrange activities and excursions in the surrounding area. Massages and an airport shuttle service are also provided.

Located just a 3-minute walk from the spice market, Riad des Eaux et des Epices offers a rooftop terrace with panoramic views of the Atlas Mountains. The air-conditioned guest rooms include free Wi-Fi access.
Decorated in a traditional Moroccan style, the rooms have neutral colours and wooden furniture. A hairdryer is provided in the private bathrooms, which are styled with Tadellakt.
A continental breakfast is served every morning at this riad, and it can be delivered to your room. Traditional cuisine is prepared for dinner, and you can have Moroccan tea on the patio beside the plunge pool.
Mederssa Ben Youssef Museum is only a 5-minute walk from the riad and Marrakech Menara Airport is a 15-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Set in the heart of Marrakesh, this riad is just a 5-minute walk from the Jamaâ El Fna Square and the Royal Palace. It offers a rooftop terrace with an outdoor seating area, an on-site bar and Moroccan dishes for dinner made with local produce.
The rooms and suites at Riad Ain Marrakech are decorated in a Moroccan style with Tadelakt walls and traditional tiled floors. They also include views of the interior courtyard and a private bathroom.
Facilities available with an extra cost include a hammam, a hot tub and beauty treatments in the massage room overlooking the Koutoubia Mosque. You can also organise on-site cookery classes, quad bike tours and camel rides at the 24-hour reception.
Free Wi-Fi is available in the entire riad and there is also a lounge where you can watch TV. Marrakesh-Menara Airport is 3.7 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located 650 feet from Jamaâ El Fna Square, this traditional riad offers hammam treatments and a rooftop terrace with views of the medina. The Bahia Palace is just a 3-minute walk away.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Riad Moulay are colourful and decorated with traditional Moroccan tiles. They are each equipped with free Wi-Fi access and offer a seating area with a fireplace.
Breakfast is served daily at the riad and for lunch and dinner guests can sample traditional Moroccan dishes. When the weather is nice, meals can be enjoyed beside the fountain in the courtyard.
Guests are invited to sunbathe on the rooftop terrace or enjoy a massage or hammam treatment during their stay. Staff are available 24 hours a day at the riad and can organise sightseeing excursions.
Marrakech International Airport is a 15-minute drive away and Dar Si Said Museum of Art is a 5-minute walk from the riad.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Mille et Une Nuits is in the heart of Medina, within a 7 minute walk of the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square in the Dar El Bacha district. It features a spa, hammam and rooftop terrace with a solarium and hot tub.
Nearby sites include the Koutoubia Mosque, the Museum of Marrakech, the Majorelle Garden and the Bahia Palace.
The Riad Mille Et Une Nuits features traditionally decorated rooms with Tadelakt walls, and Zelliges and Bejmatts floors. They offer large and bright spaces and the suites have comfortable lounges and nice fireplaces.
The open patio of the Riad offers a relaxing setting where guests can enjoy a drink or dine. With a lovely fountain, it remains cool even in the summertime.
Meals are cooked on site by the hotel's cook according to guests’ requirements. They are made from fresh produce found in the markets of Marrakech. Guests have the option of dining in the lounge, on the patio or on the terrace.
The attentive staff will help guests make the most of their stay and enjoy the main tourist attractions and hidden wonders of the city.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Alboraq is located in the Bab Taghzout area of Marrakech’s Medina, a 15-minute walk from the Djamaa el Fna Square.  It offers elegant rooms overlooking a courtyard with a pool.
Each of the guest rooms mixes a unique blend of contemporary and traditional decoration.  They include air conditioning, free Wi-Fi access and a private bathroom.
Alboraq Riad provides a daily breakfast and complimentary tea and cakes in the afternoon.  The Riad can also offer lunch or dinner menus if reserved in advance.
Guests can relax in the swimming pool set within an internal courtyard, or on the sundeck of the Riad’s rooftop terrace.
In addition to an airport shuttle service, Riad Alboraq also offers a laundry and dry cleaning service.  Menara Airport is 3.7 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Adama Resort and Spa Marrakech offers views of the Atlas Mountains and a free shuttle service to Jamaâ El Fna Square, 10 minutes away. It has a wellness centre with a hammam and massages.
The traditional suites and villas at Adama Resort and Spa Marrakech are arranged around the pool and exotic gardens. Each has a private balcony or terrace and some have a private entrance. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.
Buffet breakfast is served every morning and Restaurant les Oliviers offers Moroccan cuisine on the terrace. Alternatively, guests can use the accommodation’s kitchen to make meals.
A baby kit, including a high chair, a bottle warmer and a baby cot, is provided upon demand. A kids club is available at the resort during school holidays. Guests can play pétanque and beach volleyball on site and themed parties are organised.
The hotel has a 24-hour front desk and a free airport shuttle service. Free parking is available on site and Marrakech is just 4.3 miles away.

Located a short 20 minutes walking distance from the heart of Marrakech and the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square, Riad Losra is a great base from which to wander through the exciting streets of the Souks and discover the historic landmarks of the enchanting Red City.

Rooms at Riad Nabila feature traditional Moroccan furnishings and are each equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi. Some rooms overlook the riad’s courtyard and all rooms have an en suite bathroom with a shower.
Breakfast is served daily and in the evening guests can enjoy traditional Moroccan dishes made from local produce. Meals can be served in the stylish dining room or in the courtyard beside the pool.

hotel_desc_detail:
Les Lauriers Blancs is in the Bab Doukkala district of Marrakech, near the medina (historic quarter). It offers elegant rooms with air conditioning.
The spacious rooms open onto an interior patio with a fountain and a hot tub. They have private bathrooms and free Wi-Fi.
Riad Les Lauriers Blancs offers a roof terrace with lounge chairs and a barbecue, a sitting room with a fireplace and a flat-screen TV.
Breakfast is served every morning. Traditional Moroccan specialties can be prepared upon request for lunch or dinner by the on-site chef.
Riad Les Lauriers Blancs also offers free cookery courses and a free babysitting service. The friendly staff will be happy to organize an airport shuttle service and excursions throughout your stay.

hotel_desc_summary:
Domaine des Remparts on 2-acres of grounds in Marrakech, and offers a view of the Atlas Mountains. It offers swimming pool and fitness center and 2 restaurants.
All of the rooms and suites have a terrace and private garden. Some of the suites have a sitting room with a fireplace.
The Oriental restaurant is open for dinner and breakfast and offers traditional Moroccan cuisine and a selection of international dishes.
The Grill restaurant is the perfect place to enjoy grilled fish or meat and Moroccan salads by the swimming pool.
Finally, guests at the Domaine des Remparts are invited to a luxury spa with hammam, exfoliation massage, aromatherapy bath, beauty treatment.
