hotel_desc_summary:
This traditional Moroccan Riad is a 10-minute walk from Jamâa El Fna Square and features an outdoor swimming pool and a terrace with a lounge area and a spa. Free Wi-Fi is available in the public areas.
Decorated with the theme of the 5 natural elements, each of the air-conditioned room at Dar Elma has a patio view and includes a private bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer.
A continental breakfast with Moroccan delicacies is offered daily. The restaurant served local specialties that can also be taken in the patio or on the terrace. Cooking classes of Moroccan cuisine are also provided.
A living room with books and a TV is available on site. At a surcharge, guests can access to the hammam and spa bath, and have massages.
The Marrakech Airport is a 15-minute drive and Shuttle service is provided at an extra cost. The Train Station is 1.9 miles away and the Marrakech Museum is a 5 minute walk.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the old medina in Marrakesh, Riad Ailen offers traditional, Moroccan accommodation with an organic garden in a patio. It has a plunge pool and a common lounge.
The rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and a private bathroom with bathtub or shower. They feature decoration with arabesques.
At the riad, breakfast includes traditional Moroccan specialties or continental products. There is a Moroccan restaurant on site and a room service is also available.
Jemaa el-Fnaa Square is a 15-minute walk away and Ben Youssef Madrasa is a 10-minute walk away. Marrakesh Train Station is just 3.1 miles away, while Marrakesh Menara Airport is a 30-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in a peaceful and quiet district in the heart of the Medina, this house offers freshness, comfort and delight, just 10 minutes walk from the reputed Jamaâ El Fna Square.
Recently renovated, Dar Othmane is composed of 5 rooms comfortably furnished, a Moroccan lounge, a patio with a fountain and a large terrace. It has maintained its connection to tradition while harmoniously blending modern amenities and facilities.
All rooms and suites are air conditioned with private bathrooms and toilets. Bath linen is provided by the hotel.
Enjoy home-made Maroccan cuisine in the hotel’s restaurant for lunch or dinner. The chef will delight you with the flavours of Morocco.
In Dar Othmane, you will feel at home in a cosy and nice atmosphere.

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated in a calm district of the Medina, close to Bab Ksour and two minutes from Jemaa El Fna square, this refined riad is a haven of peace and tranquillity.
Riad Bel Haj has been lovingly renovated and beautifully decorated to create a contemporary yet comfortable home. Traditional Moroccan materials and craftsmanship have been used to great effect and there are all the modern refinements as air conditioning and free wireless internet. You will appreciate the patio with a refreshing plunge pool or also the terrace with wonderful views of the Medina and the Atlas Mountains.
Riad Bel Haj is an oasis of peace and serenity only few steps from the excitement of the Medina and close to the modern Gueliz district.
Services Included :

- Complimentary still mineral water, fruits in the room, tea and coffee throughout the day

Riad 107 is located in Marrakech medina near Jamaâ El Fna Square. It features a plunge pool, massage rooms and hammam. A 24-hour room service and restaurant.
Rooms at Riad 107 are individually decorated and have a private bathroom with tadelakt tile decoration. All rooms are air-conditioned. Bathrobes and hairdryers are stocked in the bathroom. An ironing board is at your disposal.
Riad 107 serves breakfast each morning and provides mint tea at arrival. The riad also serves traditional Moroccan cuisine for lunch and dinner in the dining room or on the terrace.
Guests are invited to relax in Riad 107’s library lounge. Additional facilities at Riad 107 include a tour desk and free Wi-Fi in public areas. Massages are also on offer.

Showcasing an outdoor pool and barbecue, La Rose De L Atlas is located in Marrakesh in the region of Marrakech-Safi, just 3.2 miles from Olive Plantations. Olive Plantations is 3.2 miles away. Free private parking is available on site.
Some units have a terrace and/or balcony. There is also a kitchen in some of the units equipped with a dishwasher. Bed linen are provided.
Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant which has grocery deliveries available on request.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Marrakesh, Malaya Suites & Villas offers a garden and year-round outdoor pool. Palais de La Bahia is 7 miles from the property. Free private parking is available on site.
Featuring a terrace, all units are air conditioned and feature a sitting and dining area. Some units include a balcony and/or patio with mountains views. There is also a kitchen, fitted with a toaster. A refrigerator and coffee machine are also available. There is a private bathroom with a bathtub and bidet in every unit. Towels are featured.
Malaya Suites & Villas also includes a barbecue. Grocery deliveries and packed lunches are available on request.
You can play ping-pong at the property, and bike rental and car rental are available. A number of activities are available in the area, such as golfing, horseback riding and biking. Museum Dar Si Said is 8 miles from Malaya Suites & Villas, and Olive Plantations is 8 miles away. The nearest airport is Menara, 8 miles from Malaya Suites & Villas, and the property provides a free airport shuttle service.

Located 4.3 miles from Marrakech Airport, Riad Hayane can arrange activities and excursions in the surrounding area.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Al Jana is set in the centre of Marrakech, just 0.6 miles from the Jemaâ El Fna Square and the Koutoubia Mosque. The traditionally designed riad offers a terrace and a patio with a fountain and a plunge pool.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Riad Al Jana feature a traditional décor and a seating area. They each include a private bathroom with a bath or a shower.
A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning at Riad Al Jana and local cuisine is served in the dining area. Guests are invited to relax in the Moroccan lounge or take part of a guided city visit or excursion organised by the riad.
Marrakech Menara Airport is a 20-minute drive away and an airport transfer service is available upon request. The property is 650 feet from the Almoravid Koubba and 1.6 miles from the Majorelle Garden.

hotel_desc_summary:
Ideally located in Hivernage at the heart of Marrakesh, Dellarosa Hotel Suites & Spa, features a luxurious and peaceful setting, comfortable rooms and excellent facilities.
Rooms come fully equipped with modern amenities including private bathroom, comfortable beds, satellite TV, and free Wi-Fi access.
The bar and restaurant feature superb drinks and dishes, blending international and local flavors. Guests can dine against a panoramic backdrop of the Atlas Mountains.
The Dellarosa is only a few minutes from the medina (historic quarter) and the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square. Back in the relaxing atmosphere of the hotel, guests can enjoy an outdoor swimming pool and luxurious spa including hammam, hot tub and fitness center.

hotel_desc_summary:
Only 15 minutes' from Jamaa El Fna, Résidence Habiba offers self-catering accommodation in Marrakech. An outdoor pool with sunbeds, a heated pool, a garden and a restaurant are just some of the on-site facilities.
Providing free Wi-Fi access, the air-conditioned apartments all have a balcony or a terrace with views of the garden or the pool, a bathroom with shower and a flat-screen TV. The kitchens are equipped with a microwave, fridge and electric kettle.
A continental breakfast is available at Résidence Habiba. The restaurant serves Moroccan and international cuisine, upon reservation.
Guests have access to a hammam, and massages can be booked on site. A game room with billiards, table soccer and ping-pong facilities is at guests’ disposal for free.
With both Marrakech Airport and Marrakech Train Station 8 and 6.2 miles away, the property offers free, private parking on site. Airport transfers can be organised through the front desk.

The air-conditioned guest rooms at Riad les Rêves d’Amélie feature a traditional décor and a seating area. They each include a wardrobe and a bathroom with a bathtub or a shower.
A continental breakfast can be enjoyed every morning and Moroccan cuisine is served in the dining area upon request. The property can help organise various activities in the areas, such as sightseeing, golfing and trekking.
Riad les Rêves d’Amélie is 150 feet from the Saadian Tombs and El Badi Palace. The property is a 10-minute drive from Marrakech Menara Airport.

hotel_desc_summary:
The 4-star equivalent riad is located east of the Medina. It features 6 comfortable and colourful rooms set around a central patio, complete with a fountain and fruit trees.
Each room is designed in a unique and charming style, using authentic materials, inspired by the rich traditions of Morocco and has its own bathroom with shower including hand and bath soap, shampoo, body lotion and a hair dryer.
Enjoy traditional Moroccan dishes, which are prepared on site by the 3 chefs. You can also choose to combine dinner with a cookery lesson. Everything contributes to making an unforgettable stay. Riad Shaden is a home away from home that offers a warm welcome with a personal touch and a friendly atmosphere.
At the Riad Shaden, enjoy a sunny day in the large and comfortable sun beds on the terrace or in the covered living area of the terrace. Sun Towels are available and dining is available on the terrace during the warmer months.
Riad Shaden can organize your Airport transfer and excursions at an additional cost.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the Old Medina, just a 15-minute walk from Jamaa El Fna Square, Riad Aicha offers a free indoor swimming pool, a terrace with sun loungers, a hammam and massages upon request. The famous Majorelle Garden is 1.9 miles from the riad.
Decorated in a traditional Moroccan style, all rooms are air-conditioned and feature views of the patio and a seating area. The en suite bathroom includes tadelakt walls and zellij tiles.
A Moroccan breakfast is served daily on the terrace, patio or in the Berber tent. Guests can also sample the local cuisine on the patio upon request.
Additional features include an airport shuttle service, the organisation of tour excursions, free Wi-Fi access and a lounge with a fireplace and library. Marrakech Menara Airport is ideally located 7.5 miles away.

hotel_desc_detail:
Riad Hiba is located in the heart of Marrakech just 150 feet from Jemaâ El Fna Square and 2,450 feet from the Koutoubia Mosque. Guests are free to relax on the rooftop terrace or by the fountain in the patio.
The guest rooms feature a traditional Moroccan décor, tile flooring and a seating area. They each include a wardrobe and a private bathroom with free toiletries and a bath or a shower.
Moroccan cuisine can be enjoyed in the dining area upon request. A traditional Berber tent is set up on the terrace and the property can help organise excursions in the surrounding areas.
Riad Hiba is 2,450 feet from Palais de la Bahia and a 10-minute drive from the Majorelle Gardens. The Ben Youssef Madrasa is 0.7 miles away and Marrakech-Menara Airport is reached by car in 20 minutes.

hotel_desc_summary:
This property is 1 minute walk from the beach. Ideally located in the heart of the Medina, near the spas and the Royal and the Amelkis golf courses, this refined guest house offers comfortable, minimalistic Moroccan style accommodation. Wi-Fi access is available in all areas.
Recently renovated, the Riad Calista has preserved its authenticity with a simple, pure style.
The Riad comprises of 4 suites, each with a private patio. After a hectic day strolling through the streets of this vibrant city, you will enjoy the quietness and the freshness of the house.
During your stay you can explore the wonderful surroundings of the hotel, including the numerous markets, monuments and entertainment on the Jamaâ El Fna Square.
The team will welcome you in a cosseted space and the serenity and freshness of a patio with trees and a swimming pool. The guest house is equipped with modern facilities to ensure the comfort. You will appreciate the charm and the luxury of its original decoration.

Riad Shemsi offers a vast rooftop terrace with stunning views of the Medina and Atlas Mountains, and a large swimming pool in the courtyard.
All accommodation combines a Moroccan and contemporary style and the suite features a spacious seating area.
A full breakfast is served every morning and Moroccan dishes are offered in the restaurant. Guests can also request sandwiches or salads, whilst sunbathing and admiring the views from the terrace.
Guests can browse the free Wi-Fi by the fireplace in the living room or in the traditional Moroccan seating areas. Nearby street parking is free and Marrakesh Menara Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_detail:
Located in the heart of the Royal Kasbah district in the ancient Marrakech Medina, this romantic guest house is a 10-minute walk from the Royal Palace and the Saadian Tombs and 15 minutes from the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square.
Riad Shemsi offers a vast rooftop terrace with stunning views of the Medina and Atlas Mountains, and a large swimming pool in the courtyard.
All accommodation combines a Moroccan and contemporary style and the suite features a spacious seating area.
A full breakfast is served every morning and Moroccan dishes are offered in the restaurant. Guests can also request sandwiches or salads, whilst sunbathing and admiring the views from the terrace.
Guests can browse the free Wi-Fi by the fireplace in the living room or in the traditional Moroccan seating areas. Nearby street parking is free and Marrakesh Menara Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

Riad Karmel Rose de Marrakech offers simply decorated double rooms with satellite TV and a DVD player. Each one is air-conditioned and also offers free Wi-Fi and free toiletries in the private bathroom.
A continental breakfast is provided every morning on the terrace, on the patio or in the comfort of guest rooms. You can also sample traditional, Moroccan dishes for lunch and dinner.

hotel_desc_summary:
A 12-minute walk from the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square, Ryad Laârouss Family provides luxury rooms within a traditional Moroccan-style house. A panoramic roof terrace and spa centre feature on site, and Marrakech’s medina is a 15-minute walk away.
With free Wi-Fi, each of the air-conditioned guest rooms is uniquely decorated with typical Moroccan furnishings, following a unique design concept. All include a safe, minibar and private bathroom with hairdryer.
Offering panoramic views of Marrakech and the Atlas Mountains, the rooftop restaurant serves a range of Moroccan dishes and some European dishes.
The spa includes an indoor swimming pool on the ground floor, an outdoor hot tub on the terrace and a steam room. Oriental massages and body treatments are available on site.
Ryad Laârouss Family can organise a range of trips to local attractions including the Ourika Valley, Moulay Brahim, the desert, Ouarzazate and Essaouira. Marrakech-Menara Airport is 2.5 miles away and a shuttle bus service is available at the property.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the heart of the ancient Medina, this guesthouse is just half a mile from Jemaâ el Fna Square. You can enjoy the views from the rooftop terrace or borrow one of the free bicycles and explore the city.
Riad Barroko offers rooms with authentic furniture and Moroccan architecture. All rooms are air-conditioned and some have an LCD TV with satellite channels.
The riad serves a continental breakfast every morning in the interior courtyard. You can also relax by the swimming pool before sampling gourmet Moroccan cuisine in Le Barroko Restaurant.
A communal lounge, a 24-hour front desk and car rental are some of the other on-site facilities. Marrakesh-Menara Airport is a 15 minute drive away and Marrakesh Train Station is 2 miles from the riad.

hotel_desc_summary:
The Dar Catalina is a typical Moroccan house offering comfortable accommodation and an authentic experience just a 5-minute walk from the famous and lively Jamaâ El Fna Square.
Guest rooms at the Dar Catalina are equipped with en suite facilities, air conditioning, a safe and satellite TV. They provide an elegant and cosy living space for your stay in Marrakech.
Start the day with the tasty breakfast before visiting the city. Afterwards, come back and relax on the patio or roof terrace, which overlooks the Koutoubia and Atlas Mountains.
Guests at the Dar Catalina are invited to make use of the services in the neighbouring Riad Catalina. These include a lovely swimming pool and a restaurant open for lunch and dinner.

hotel_desc_summary:
This Riad is situated in the ancient quarter of Bab Doukkala, 15 minutes away from the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square, away from the hustle of the heart of Marrakesh.
A typical Arabian house, Dar Tuscia provides a small, peaceful and softly coloured oasis, contrasting with the bustle of the souks that you find while walking through the citys narrow streets.
The 5 charming guestrooms are uniquely decorated and styled. They offer a Wi-Fi internet connection and modern comfort.
Set around a green patio, enjoy an ideal place to relax on comfortable sofas and have a cup of tea after a busy day spent in the Medina. Moreover, the Riad houses a hall with a fireplace and a terrace and solarium full of plants and flowers, with deckchairs and a typical Bedouin tent.
For your well-being, Dar Tuscia has its own Hammam, after which a relaxing massage will regenerate your body and your mind. Also, the cook serves a delicious tagine and traditional cuisine, sure to delight your taste buds. 


Medina is a great choice for travelers interested in 
, 
 and 
.

hotel_desc_summary:
Dating from the 18th century, Riad Dalia is just over a quarter mile from Jamaâ el Fna Square. It offers a rooftop terrace with views of the souks (markets) and Moroccan-style guest rooms with views of the interior courtyard.
Facilities in the rooms and suites at Riad Dalia include air conditioning and a private bathroom with bathrobes. While all accommodations features mosaic tiles, some also have a sitting area with a fireplace.
A continental breakfast is provided every morning on the terrace, in guest rooms or in the courtyard. The hosts at the riad can also prepare Moroccan cuisine for lunch and dinner, if you reserve in advance.
Transportation from the airport and excursions can be organized at the 24-hour front desk. Other local attractions include Ben Youssef Mosque and the Majorelle Gardens, both less than a 20 minute walk away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Laora is a traditional guesthouse offering spacious and elegantly furnished rooms and suites. It features a plunge-pool and a large sun terrace fitted with a typical Moroccan tent.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at the Laora are all individually decorated and are equipped with free Wi-Fi access. Each has a private bathroom, which includes toiletries and bathrobes.
The on-site restaurant and bar serves traditional Moroccan cuisine, which can be enjoyed on the terrace in nice weather. Room service is also available.
In the heart of Marrakesh’s Medina district, Riad Laora is just a 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square, the main market square. The Gare Voyageurs ONCF Train Station is 3.7 miles away.

hotel_desc_detail:
Offering an outdoor pool, seasonal outdoor pool and barbecue, Riad Les Portes De La Medina is located in Marrakech. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Free private parking is available on site.
Every room at this riad is air conditioned . The riad features a communal flat-screen TV. Certain units have a seating area for your convenience. You will find a coffee machine and a kettle in the room. Every room includes a private bathroom equipped with a bath or shower.
The property features a grocery store, a snack bar, a pizzeria, a Moroccan restaurant, a pharmacy and a pastry shop.
Car hire and excursions can be organised at a cost at this riad and the area is popular for golfing. A boules court and a football court are also available.  Museum des Amis de Marrakech is 0.9 miles from Riad Les Portes De La Medina, while Museum Dar Si Said is 1.1 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Marrakech-Menara Airport, 3.7 miles from Riad Les Portes De La Medina.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the heart of the medina (historic quarter), this 19th-century riad features an outdoor swimming pool and hammam treatments. Guests can enjoy a panoramic view of the medina (historic quarter) and Atlas Mountains from the rooftop terrace with lounge chairs.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Le Pavillon Oriental have a traditional Moroccan decor and include a private bathroom with a shower. Free Wi-Fi is available in all rooms.
Breakfast is served daily at the riad and includes pastries from Western Morocco. For lunch and dinner, the riad’s chef prepares traditional Moroccan dishes.
For a supplement, guests are invited to enjoy a hammam or massage treatment during their stay. The riad also features 5 lounges where guests can watch TV or drink mint tea.
The riad is a 5 minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square and The Bahia Palace is half a mile away. Dar Si Said Museum of Art is just over a quarter mile from the riad.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Linda is located a 5-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It offers en suite accommodation, a garden, hammam and rooftop terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the riad.
Riad Linda’s rooms combine traditional features, including tadelakt and zillege tiles, with modern amenities. Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom with walk-in shower.
Guests are invited to relax on Riad Linda’s rooftop terrace, which offers 360 degree views of the medina and the Atlas Mountains. The riad also has a central courtyard and a lounge with traditional cushioned seats around a decorative waterfall.
The Riad’s chef prepares and serves delicious meals using only fresh, local and mainly organic ingredients. Guests can also learn how to make Moroccan meals with the onsite chef.
Riad Linda offers numerous activities such as white water rafting, hot air ballooning and Sahara Safari Tours. An airport transfer service can be organised upon request.

hotel_desc_detail:
Riad Linda is located a 5-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It offers en suite accommodation, a garden, hammam and rooftop terrace. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the riad.
Riad Linda’s rooms combine traditional features, including tadelakt and zillege tiles, with modern amenities. Each room is air-conditioned and equipped with a private bathroom with walk-in shower.
Guests are invited to relax on Riad Linda’s rooftop terrace, which offers 360 degree views of the medina and the Atlas Mountains. The riad also has a central courtyard and a lounge with traditional cushioned seats around a decorative waterfall.
The Riad’s chef prepares and serves delicious meals using only fresh, local and mainly organic ingredients. Guests can also learn how to make Moroccan meals with the onsite chef.
Riad Linda offers numerous activities such as white water rafting, hot air ballooning and Sahara Safari Tours. An airport transfer service can be organised upon request.

hotel_desc_summary:
A 10-minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna, Riad Ifoulki offers a rooftop terrace with sunbeds and views of the Medina. This traditional Moroccan house also features 2 patios, a plunge pool and a hammam.
The rooms at Riad Ifoulki are decorated in a traditional Moroccan style featuring Zellij tiling and artisanal handicraft. Equipped with air-conditioning and en suite facilities, they all have views of the patio.
A Moroccan breakfast is available on site and can be served on the terrace, patio, or in the lounges. Riad Ifoulki also features a restaurant where guests can enjoy international and Moroccan cuisine.
Located 2.5 miles from the train station and 4.3 miles from the airport, Riad Ifoulki can arrange activities and excursions in the surrounding area. And the Royal Golf is only 1.2 miles from the hotel.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located on one of the main avenues in Marrakech, this entirely soundproofed hotel offers panoramic views on the Atlas, the Koutoubia, and Mohammed VI Avenue. It also has a spa with a hammam and a swimming pool.
The guest rooms have a traditional Moroccan décor. They are equipped with satellite TV, tea and coffee facilities and a minibar with a free bottle of water upon arrival. The private bathrooms feature a hairdryer, and some of the rooms have a view of the street and some others are fitted with wheelchair facilities.
For your relaxation, the Amani features a café, a snack bar and a panoramic restaurant with a solarium. Massages are also available on request.

Situated in the centre of the Medina, this small charming Riad is close to the Bahia palace, only 6 minutes from the Jamaâ El Fna Square.
The Riad El Grably has everything to make your stay comfortable and memorable. The air-conditioned guestrooms are decorated in typical Moroccan style and are equipped with a modern en suite facilities.
To relax, the Grably offers 2 patios, a swimming pool (heated during school holidays), a garden, a fountain, tables and deckchairs where you can read a book or enjoy the sunshine.
There is also a roof terrace with a hot tub giving magnificent views of the Medina which helps make the Riad El Grably unforgettable for its comfort and tranquillity.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the antiquarian area of the Medina in central Marrakech, Riad l'Orange Bleue offers a rooftop terrace, hot tub and a Moroccan tent, where you can admire the Atlas Mountains, enjoy the sun and drink mint tea. Free Wi-Fi is provided in the elegant guest rooms.
With a traditional style, each of the individually decorated rooms is air-conditioned and has a private bathroom. Some of the rooms also have a seating area or a view of the patio. Bed linen and towels are provided.
Traditional cuisine is served in the restaurant and you can dine on the terrace. A special diet menu is available upon request and a continental breakfast is prepared every morning at Riad l'Orange Bleue. You can enjoy meals on the terrace or in the dining room, by the fireplace.
Guided tours can be organized, as well as car rental and airport transfers from the 24-hour reception. You can also request a massage.
Jamaâ El Fna Square and Majorelle Gardens are both a 10-minute walk away from the riad.

hotel_desc_summary:
Maison Do is a set of 2 traditional Moroccan Riads, located on the same street, one in front each other. With a traditional architecture, it features a restaurant, a rooftop swimming pool and a hammam.
Furnished with a Moroccan décor, the air-conditioned rooms at Maison Do feature a private bathroom with bath or shower and are provided with free Wi-Fi. The suites are larger and also include a seating area with sofas.
A continental breakfast is offered daily. The restaurant serves local specialties that can also be taken on the terrace. Guests can relax in the massage room or in the furnished patio, which features orange trees and fountains.
Moroccan cooking lessons, car rental and guided tours in Marrakech are all available at Maison Do. Jamâa El Fna Square is a 12-minute walk, the Airport is a 20-minute drive and the Train Station is 2.5 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Featuring a hammam and panoramic views from the terrace, this guest house is set at the heart of Marrakech. It is located 2,950 feet from Jamaa El Fna Square, has rare architectural elements and accommodated Josephine Baker during WWII.
Each luxurious guest room features traditional Moroccan décor with Berber rugs. Some rooms have a seating area with a fireplace and satellite TV. A hairdryer is included in the private bathrooms.
Traditional Moroccan cuisine is proposed in the dining room at Dar Lalla F'dila. Guests can also dine on the terrace, which offers views of the souks. Breakfast is provided every morning.
The guest house offers 24-hour front desk service. The souks and the museum of Marrakech are located 350 feet from the guest house and Marrakech-Menara International Airport is 3.1 miles away.

hotel_desc_summary:
The Imperial Plaza is in the center of Marrakesh. It has a spa and health club and a roof-top terrace with a swimming pool offering panoramic views of the city.
Each guest room at the Imperial Plaza is air conditioned and equipped with satellite TV, a private bathroom and Wi-Fi internet access. All rooms are serviced by an elevator.
A buffet breakfast is served daily and the hotel has several restaurants that offer international and Moroccan cuisine. There are also 2 bars with a terrace where guests can enjoy a drink served with organic Moroccan pastries.
The Imperial Plaza is only a few minutes drive from the main shopping area of Avenue Mohamed V and a 10-minute drive from the Jemaa El Fna square in the medina (historic quarter). It is a 15-minute drive from the Royal Golf Club and Marrakech-Menara Airport.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in the heart of the medina in Marrakech, Riad Alwane features a swimming pool and offers an environment dedicated to your relaxation.
Listed by the Moroccan authority, Riad Alwane combines a traditional style and modern comforts with authentic Moroccan hospitality. Riad Alwane features 8 individually decorated rooms. The decoration in each room is inspired by a precious stone.
A traditional breakfast is served each morning at Riad Alwane.
The riad is easy to reach by car. It offers a peaceful setting in the heart of a lively Medina. Airport and city shuttles can also be arranged at competitive prices.
The tea will be offered each night between 17:00 to 19:00 in patio or in swimming pool.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Al Karama is centrally located in the heart of the medina, just a few steps away from Jamaâ El Fna Square. This typical Moroccan house offers personalised service and free Wi-Fi.
Rooms are spacious and are individually decorated in Moroccan traditional style. They are fully equipped with en suite facilities and air conditioning.
Enjoy a delicious breakfast on the sunny roof terrace or on the patio. Fine Moroccan cuisine can be served for lunch or dinner upon request.
Riad Al Karama is an ancient Marrakesh residence which has been transformed into a riad. Tradition and modern comforts are combined to provide an authentic Moroccan experience.
This guest house offers you comfort and serenity.

Riad Alamir is set in the heart of the Medina. It offers individually decorated rooms, a terrace with views over the souks, and a swimming pool.
All the rooms have ensuite facilities and are equipped with air-conditioning. Riad Alamir serves a full breakfast and in the evening guests can enjoy regional cuisine.
Guests can organize tours from the Riad. Hiking treks, Moroccan cooking courses and cultural excursions are all on offer. The Riad is ideally located just a 4-minute walk from the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square. Marrakech airport is just 15min away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Les Suites de Marrakech is located in the centre of Marrakech, just 1.6 miles from the Koutoubia and Jemaâ El Fna Square. It offers self-catering apartments with access to a shared outdoor swimming pool.
The air-conditioned apartments open onto a balcony and include a lounge area with satellite TV, a DVD player and a CD player.  They each have a private bathroom with a shower.
The apartments at Les Suites de Marrakech also have a kitchen fitted with a microwave and a refrigerator. Meals can be enjoyed in the dining area and free Wi-Fi is provided.
Free private parking is possible on site and the Marrakech Plaza shopping centre is 1,650 feet away. The property is 3.1 miles from Marrakech Menara Airport and 0.6 miles from the Majorelle Garden.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in l’Agdal tourist area, the Ushuaia clubbing hôtel is a luxurious hotel with a spa, a swimming pool and a 1500 m² rooftop terrace. It features a bar, a restaurant and a nightclub.
Guest rooms at the Ushuaia clubbing hôtel have a traditional Moroccan design, and are equipped with air-conditioning, satellite TV and free Wi-Fi connection. Room service is also available.
The hotel restaurant serves both international and Moroccan cuisine. The wellness centre includes a fitness area, a hammam and a range of beauty and massage treatments.
There is free on-site parking and the hotel organises a free shuttle twice a day to Jamaâ El Fna Square. The hotel is close to 555 nightclub and Almazar shopping centre. The city centre and airport are both just 10 minutes away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated at the heart of the famous Marrakesh Medina, near the souks and a short ride from the Jamaâ El Fna Square, this attractive house has been restored respecting Moroccan traditions.
Riad Zouar offers the perfect mix of local style and the comfort of modernity, convenient for those who look for an authentic and friendly atmosphere.
Guest rooms are comfortable and equipped with a fan, heating and en suite bathroom, decorated with either tadelakt or zelliges (typical Moroccan tiles).
Add to this a warm reception and substantial breakfasts served in the lounge or on the pleasant patio, and your stay at the Zouar will be unforgettable.

hotel_desc_summary:
Medina Loft & Spa is situated in Marrakech, just 1.9 miles from the Majorelle Garden and 2.7 miles from the Koutoubia Mosque. It offers self-catering apartments, a swimming pool and a spa centre with a hammam.

hotel_desc_summary:
This design hotel is just a few minutes away from the Marrakesh Menara Airport.  It features an outdoor pool and most of the rooms have a balcony or terrace.
The spacious guest rooms at the Hotel Les Trois Palmiers are air conditioned and have a modern decor. Each is equipped with a flat-screen TV with satellite channels and a minibar.
The hotel offers 2 restaurants. Guests can enjoy international cuisine at Le Contintental or typical Moroccan cuisine at Le Tayfour. There is also a snack bar, Kech Delight, which offers light cuisine and dietary options.
Additional facilities at the Trois Palmiers include a sun terrace and a lounge area. Free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel’s public areas, and massage and body treatments are provided in guest rooms on request.
The hotel is less than a 10-minute drive from central Marrakesh and the Medina district.

The hotel offers 2 restaurants. Guests can enjoy international cuisine at Le Contintental or typical Moroccan cuisine at Le Tayfour. There is also a snack bar, Kech Delight, which offers light cuisine and dietary options.
Additional facilities at the Trois Palmiers include a sun terrace and a lounge area. Free Wi-Fi is available in the hotel’s public areas, and massage and body treatments are provided in guest rooms on request.
The hotel is less than a 10-minute drive from central Marrakesh and the Medina district. 
Couples in particular like the location – they rated it 8 for a two-person trip.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Amina is located in the north of Marrakech’s Medina, 1,650 feet from Jamaâ El Fna Square.  Set within a traditional Moroccan riad, it has a rooftop terrace with a hot tub.
Situated around the inner courtyard, the guest rooms are each uniquely decorated and feature air conditioning, heating and free Wi-Fi access.
The restaurant at Riad Amina serves Moroccan and French specialities using fresh, local produce.  Guests can dine in the inner courtyard or inside the sitting room.
The spacious roof terrace has a sun deck area.  Within the ground floor of the adjoining Dar guests can use the Hammam, beauty treatment rooms and massages.
Riad Amina is able to organise an airport shuttle service and tours in and around Marrakech. Menara Airport is 5.6 miles away.

Riad D'Airain features rooms and suites with a minibar and free Wi-Fi access. With air conditioning in each one, all have a small seating area and some include direct access onto the terrace.
You can sample the continental breakfast, traditional dishes and gastronomic cuisine on the patio or on the terrace. The riad can also organise private BBQs with Moroccan-style live entertainment.

hotel_desc_summary:
Just under a 10 minute walk from Jemaa El Fna Square, Riad Princesse du Desert is on a residential side street. It offers traditional Moroccan décor, a terrace, a Moroccan salon and patio with a fountain.
This remodeled 18th-century building is uniquely and traditionally decorated. All rooms are air-conditioned and open onto the patio. They all have a private bathroom, which features zellij tiles and tadellakt walls and includes free toiletries and a hairdryer.
A continental breakfast is offered and guests can sample Moroccan specialties at the riad upon request. You can also relax on the patio with Moroccan tea.
Additional features include cooking lessons, laundry facilities, car rental and an airport shuttle service. Marrakech-Menara Airport and the Royal Golf Course are both 4 miles from the riad.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riyad El Cadi is situated in a side street in Marrakech’s medina and only 2,300 feet from Jamaâ El Fna with its lively markets. It has a hammam and air-conditioned accommodations. It also provides an airport shuttle service.
The riad comprises 7 traditional Moroccan houses with courtyards and arched terraces. All the rooms and suites have a minibar and a private bathroom with a bathrobe and free toiletries.
A continental breakfast is offered daily and can be taken on the rooftop terrace or in the salons. Traditional Moroccan and international dishes are available for lunch and dinner, and packed lunches can also be arranged.
Guests have access to 3 salons and alcoves, a library and there is free Wi-Fi access in the main courtyard. Additional facilities include a plunge pool and terraces equipped with tents and deckchairs.
Staff are available to assist with local tours and excursions and there is a tour desk at Riyad El Cadi. 


Medina is a great choice for travelers interested in

.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Bab Doukkala in the Marrakech medina, Dar Balthazar is an elegant riad with personal service. It is a 5-minute walk from the souks and Jemaâ El Fna Square.
There is a bathroom with traditional Moroccan tiles in every guest room. The suites also feature air conditioning and a balcony that looks over the courtyard and fountain.
Guests are invited to relax in the lounge with satellite TV, or around the fireplace. The sun terrace provides a panoramic view over the medina. There is also a computer with internet access.
The on-site chef will prepare typical Moroccan meals on request. The friendly staff will help you to organise your visit, including transfers to and from the airport.

Riad Kasbah is located in the heart of Marrakech’s medina, a 7-minute walk from Jamaa el Fna square near the Saadien tombs. It offers suites, an interior patio with trees.
Riad Kasbah’s suites are individually decorated and air-conditioned. They surround the interior patio and are equipped with a telephone, satellite TV, internet access and private bathroom.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Marrakesh, Sabor Appartements Palmeraie is 2.9 miles from Metro Shopping (Marrakech). There is a water park on site and guests can enjoy the on-site bar. Museum des Amis de Marrakech is 3.9 miles away. Free WiFi is provided and free private parking is available on site.
All units include a sitting and dining area. Some units feature a terrace and/or patio. There is also a kitchen, equipped with a microwave and toaster. A refrigerator is also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Each unit is fitted with a private bathroom with bathrobes and free toiletries. Bed linen are available.
Appartements Sabor Palmeraie also includes an outdoor pool. Guests can enjoy the on-site restaurant.
You can play mini-golf at the property, and bike rental is available. There are lots of activities in the area, such as golfing and horseback riding. Museum Dar Si Said is 4.1 miles from Sabor Appartements Palmeraie. Menara Airport is 7 miles from the property, and the property provides a free airport shuttle service.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located within Marrakech Palm Grove, 5.6 miles from the centre of Marrakech, the Palmeraie Village offers spacious apartments and villas. It features 2 swimming pools, a hammam, landscaped gardens and free parking.
The residence offers apartments with a balcony or terrace and spectacular views. Each air-conditioned apartment has a lounge or seating area with satellite TV and a fully-equipped kitchenette.
A buffet breakfast is provided every morning at the Palmeraie Village. Two poolside restaurants serve traditional and international cuisine. Guests can also enjoy a drink from the on-site bar.
Massage treatments  and car and bike rental can be arranged through the hotel.  There is also a club for children between the ages of 4 to 12.

hotel_desc_summary:
Showcasing an outdoor pool and views of the mountains, Casa Gyla is located in Marrakesh in the region of Marrakech-Safi, just 1.9 miles from Metro Shopping (Marrakech). The guesthouse has a spa center and a ski school, and guests can enjoy a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site.
Certain rooms include a sitting area where you can relax. Certain rooms feature views of the pool or garden. Each room includes a private bathroom fitted with a bidet.
You will find a 24-hour front desk, gift shop, and shops at the property.
This guesthouse has a ski pass sales point and ski equipment, bike rental and car rental are available. You can play tennis and mini-golf at this guesthouse, and the area is popular for skiing. Museum des Amis de Marrakech is 2.8 miles from Casa Gyla, and Museum Dar Si Said is 3 miles from the property. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 6 miles from Casa Gyla.

Riad Magie d'Orient is a traditional Moroccan house offering guest accommodations around a central courtyard with a plunge pool and a fountain. Guests also have access to the rooftop terrace with shaded dining areas and day beds.
The guest rooms at Riad Magie d'Orient feature traditional techniques such as tile walls and carved wood details. All rooms have their own bathroom with shower.

hotel_desc_summary:
Situated in a calm district of the Medina, close to the museum and the Medersa Ben Youssef, this refined riad is an oasis of peace and tranquillity.
Lovingly restored and beautifully decorated by the renowned architect, Christophe Siméon, Riad Tzarra offers a comfortable and serene home in the centre of the Medina only minutes from the entrance to the Souks and the Place Jemaa el Fna.
You will find all the modern comfort with air-conditioning and wireless internet and enjoy facilities of relaxation with its refreshing plunge pool in the patio or its roof terrace with magnificent views of the Atlas Mountains.
Peaceful, beautiful and refined, Riad Tzarra is an elegant house in one of the oldest neighbourhoods of Marrakesh.
Services at the riad include complimentary still mineral water and tea and coffee throughout the day.

hotel_desc_summary:
Ideally located 500 feet from the Bab Laksour entrance, Dar Attajmil offers a rooftop terrace planted with flowers and a inner courtyard with furnished lounges. You can relax in the hammam, request a massage or take part in the cookery classes.
Guest rooms have a traditional Moroccan design, and they include air conditioning. Some of the rooms offer a seating area, and free toiletries are provided in the en suite bathrooms.
A continental breakfast with homemade crêpes, fresh bread and eggs from the farm is served every morning at this property. Traditional Moroccan dishes can be prepared for lunch and dinner upon request.
You can use the free Wi-Fi while relaxing beside the fireplace in the lounge or in the shade of the banana trees in the patio.
Jemaâ El Fna Square is a 2-minute walk from the B&B and most monuments are within walking distance. Marrakech Airport is only a 15-minute drive away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Set in a 2-hectare garden at the heart of the palm grove in Marrakech, this design property features Mexican architecture in its rooms and 2-bedroom villa. It offers a modern art gallery, spa and 6 swimming pools.
All air-conditioned rooms are equipped with a minibar and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. Each spacious room is either decorated with a contemporary theme or inspired by different countries. Some rooms feature views of the garden or swimming pool.
International cuisine is served for lunch and dinner by the swimming pool or in the restaurant. The property can also prepare Moroccan meals or special dishes upon request. The buffet breakfast can also be served by the swimming pool or in the restaurant.
Guests can play tennis on site or exercise in the fitness centre. Massages are available at the spa and it also has a cinema with a choice of over 300 films. Wi-Fi is accessible throughout the hotel.
With free private parking on site, this hotel is located 1.9 miles from the Medina. Menara International Airport is 9.3 miles away. A taxi and shuttle service is available upon request at the reception desk. Shuttles to the Medina run 3 times a day.

hotel_desc_summary:
In Marrakech’s medina (historic quarter), this riad is a 15 minute walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square.  Guests can admire the view of the Atlas Mountains from the terrace, and Moroccan dishes are served in the dining room.
Free Wi-Fi access and a sitting area feature in the air-conditioned rooms and suites, which have an elegant decoration. Each room has a private bathroom, which is decorated with Tadelakt.
A traditional breakfast is prepared every morning at the Riad Tamarrakecht. Desserts include Moroccan pastries and homemade sorbet, and guests can also request cooking lessons.
Guests can relax in the pool in the patio or in the living rooms. Excursions can be organized on site and airport shuttle service is possible for an extra fee.
Marrakech International Airport is a 15 minute drive from this riad and Amelkis Golf Club is 4 miles away. Guests can visit the Majorelle Gardens, an 8 minute drive away.

In the heart of the medina (historic quarter),  this traditional riad is 2 minutes from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It features a swimming pool and a rooftop terrace with views of the medina (historic quarter).
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Riad Lorsya are colorfully decorated and feature traditional Moroccan furnishings. Each comes equipped with free Wi-Fi and a private bathroom with a shower.
Breakfast is provided each morning at the riad and can be enjoyed in guests’ rooms. Traditional Moroccan cuisine is available upon request and is served in the dining room or on the rooftop terrace during the summer months.

With a traditional Berber architecture, this Riad features air-conditioned rooms, 2 patios with a swimming pool and a spa. Excursions are organized by the staff and free Wi-Fi is provided throughout.
Decorated with local handicraft and traditional tiled floors, rooms at Les Jardins de Mouassine have a private bathroom and free toiletries. A wardrobe and a seating area are also available.
A buffet breakfast is offered daily in the dining room and it can also be taken on the terrace or in the poolside lounge. Guests are invited to sample the Moroccan specialties proposed by the restaurant and to have a drink at the bar, which boasts a patio view.
An indoor swimming pool and a hammam are included in the spa, and massages are available upon reservation. Provided with deckchairs, the sun terrace has a view of the Koutoubia Mosque, which is only 2,950 feet away.
Located in the Medina, this Riad is a 7-minute walk from Jemâa El Fna Square and 0.9 miles from the Bahia Palace. Marrakech Airport is a 13-minute drive and the Train Station is 3 away.

hotel_desc_summary:
Less than 300 feet from Jemaâ El Fna Square, this guesthouse is just a 5 minute walk from the Koutoubia Mosque. It features a steam room, a swimming pool and rooftop terrace with views of the square and the Atlas Mountains.
The rooms and suites at Riad Le Rubis are decorated in a traditional style using tadelakt paint. Each one provides free Wi-Fi access, views of the patio and air conditioning. Some rooms also include a sitting area.
On the interior patio, on the terrace or in the dining room is where the guesthouse offers a continental breakfast. You can also sample traditional Moroccan cuisine such as tajines in the restaurant.
Tours, excursions and transportation can all be organized at the 24-hour front desk. The property also provides a lounge with a TV and massages, which are available at an extra cost.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Dari is an Italian-inspired riad offering air-conditioned rooms and a modern décor combined with traditional Moroccan architecture. It is set in the heart of Marrakech, a 10-minute walk from Jamaa el Fna Square and a 5-minute walk from the Royal Palace.
Each spacious suite has been individually decorated and features a seating area with a flat-screen TV and a minibar. There is a private bathroom with a bath or shower and free toiletries.
Continental breakfast is served daily in the dining area, patio or the sun terrace. You can also enjoy traditional local dishes or Italian cuisine on request.
Riad Dari offers a variety of services on request, including beauty treatments and a multilingual guide to visit and learn about the city. Airport transfers are also available.

hotel_desc_summary:
Located in Marrakesh in the region of Marrakech-Safi, 1.1 miles from Stadium, Hotel Ayoub & Spa features a spa center and hot tub. The hotel has a year-round outdoor pool and sauna, and guests can enjoy a meal at the restaurant or a drink at the bar. Free private parking is available on site.
Each room at this hotel is air conditioned and features a flat-screen TV. Certain accommodations include a sitting area where you can relax. Certain rooms have views of the pool or city. The rooms have a private bathroom equipped with a bathtub or shower. For your comfort, you will find bathrobes and slippers.
There is a 24-hour front desk, a shared lounge, babysitting services and a shops at the property.
The hotel also provides bike rental and car rental. Marrakech Parking Koutoubia is 1.6 miles from Hotel Ayoub & Spa, and Cyber Park Moulay Abdessalam is 1.7 miles away. The nearest airport is Menara Airport, 3.1 miles from Hotel Ayoub & Spa.

hotel_desc_summary:
Just 1,000 feet from Jamaâ El Fna Square, this bed and breakfast features 3 massage rooms, 2 hammams and a sauna. You can relax in the 170-ft² hot tub or enjoy views of the Atlas Mountains from the rooftop terrace.
The rooms combine a contemporary and Moroccan style, have an LCD TV and some of the suites feature a fireplace.
Breakfast is served every morning at Bahia Salam and Moroccan dishes are offered in the restaurant. You can also relax in the caïdale tent on the terrace or use the free Wi-Fi in the several large living rooms.

hotel_desc_summary:
Blending a modern and elegant setting with classic Moroccan charm, the Riad Villa Wenge offers stylish accommodation and professional service 2 minutes’ walk from Jamaâ El Fna Square.
A contemporary zen and sober setting, cosy atmosphere and personalised welcome, and a patio complemented by a lovely fountain make the Riad Villa Wenge a peaceful base for your holiday in the heart of the Medina.
The Riad proposes carefully decorated rooms and suites. All rooms and suites are en suite and fitted with elegant Wenge furnishings, reversible air conditioning and LCD TVs.
The restaurant serves tasty Moroccan specialities prepared using fresh market produce. It offers a refined and romantic setting.
Guests at the Riad Villa Wenge can enjoy mint tea and cold beverages in the warm and spacious lounge that opens onto the patio, while sunbathing on the terrace.

hotel_desc_summary:
Sofitel Marrakech Lounge and Spa provides luxurious accommodations half a mile from Jamaâ El Fna Square. It features a spa, 3 swimming pools and 3 restaurants and bars.
The luxury guest rooms and suites at the Sofitel Marrakech feature a private balcony overlooking the mountains or gardens. All are contemporary in style with modern furnishings and some have a separate lounge.
Gourmet, olive oil-inspired and healthy spa dishes are served in the hotel’s several restaurants. L’Orangerie features a terrace overlooking the Atlas Mountains and Darkum bar serves international teas.
Additional facilities include a fitness center and for a supplement, a spa with an indoor pool, hammam and hot tub. The hotel also has Wi-Fi throughout and a 24-hour front desk with a currency exchange service.
The hotel’s valet service can park guests’ cars in the secure outdoor or indoor parking lot. Marrakech Menara Airport is a 10 minute drive away and Bahia Palace is half a mile from the hotel.

hotel_desc_summary:
In the heart of the historic Medina, near the Bahia Palace and the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square, Riad Flam has peaceful, luxurious accommodations and a personal touch. Flam Braun and her team will personally welcome you and ensure you have a comfortable stay.
The guest rooms are individually decorated and equipped with modern technology, including floor heating to keep you warm in winter, air conditioning and a private bathroom, some of which have a rain shower. Each has a different atmosphere and you will be sure to find one that fits your taste.
Enjoy the traditional Moroccan cuisine. Chef Khadija lovingly prepares main meals or smaller snacks using only the freshest ingredients bought from local markets. Choose to be served next to the pool, on the terrace or in the privacy of the lounge and bar.
Relax in the spa, where there is a hammam, a hot tub and a pool. Flam, a masseuse by profession, has a large choice of different massages from all over the world.
For a break in a tranquil haven in the heart of Marrakesh, Riad Flam is the ideal location.

hotel_desc_summary:
Riad Diana is ideally located in Riad Zitoune, one of the most exclusive quarters in central Marrakech, less than 650 feet from the famous Jamaâ El Fna Square.
The rooms are decorated in a modern style with traditional Moroccan features that will make you feel at home from the very moment you arrive. They are all equipped with free Wi-Fi internet access.
All rooms are very large and bright, especially the senior suites with two separate double bedrooms and a nice fireplace. They also are equipped with air-conditioning and central heating.
The bright and open patio of Riad Diana is the ideal place to sit, eat, make new friends or simply relax. Even during a hot summer day you will enjoy a fresh atmosphere thanks to its large swimming pool which is heated during the colder seasons.
After a hectic day spent in the souks, you can also relax in the Riad's traditional hammam.

hotel_desc_summary:
Dix Neuf La Ksour is located in the heart of Marrakech, just 1,950 feet from Jemaâ El Fna Square. The traditionally designed riad features a patio with a plunge pool and a terrace with sunbeds overlooking the Medina.
The air-conditioned guest rooms at Dix Neuf La Ksour are light and airy and feature tile flooring and Moroccan furnishings. Each room has its own private bathroom with a bath or shower.
A traditional Moroccan breakfast is served daily in the dining area, and guests may request a continental breakfast. Evening meals can also be served in the dining area. A lounge with a fireplace is available and the riad can organise massages, cookery classes and excursions in the surrounding area.
The Koutoubia Mosque is 2,650 feet from Dix Neuf La Ksour and the Ben Youssef Madrasa is 3,100 feet away. The property is 1.6 miles from the Majorelle Garden and 4 miles from Marrakech Menara Airport.

hotel_desc_summary:
This luxury hotel is located in a 10-acre park in Marrakech, just 10 minutes driving from the Jamaâ el Fna Square. It offers free access to outdoor swimming pool, the fitness centre and 1 free visit per stay to the sauna or hammam.
Guest rooms are classically decorated using bright, Moroccan colours and feature a balcony with a view of the Atlas Mountains. Rooms are equipped with air-conditioning and free Wi-Fi access.
The international restaurant, Terrasse de l’Insensé, and the specialty restaurant, L’insensé, serve quality cuisine. There is a traditional Moroccan restaurant on site, and guests can also take advantage of the poolside snack bar and hotel piano bar.
The Kenzi Menara Palace is within walking distance of the Al Mazar shopping centre and Pacha nightclub. Free parking is available and a free shuttle service to the city centre is also provided.
The All Inclusive Premium offer includes the minibar and room service from 6 pm.

hotel_desc_summary:
Set in Marrakech’s Palmeraie, Ksar Char-Bagh offers Moroccan style accommodation in a 4-hectare garden with fig and olive trees. It has 3 swimming pools and a terrace with sun beds.
The air-conditioned rooms feature views of the pool or of the Atlas Mountains. They are all equipped with a minibar, a TV with satellite channels and a bathroom with bathrobe, free toiletries, bath and shower.
A different breakfast is served at the hotel every morning. There is a traditional Berber tent where guests can have tea. The restaurant served Moroccan and international food made from home-grown vegetables.
Guests have access to a spa, hammam and massages, at an extra cost. There is also a tennis court, a billiard room and several seating areas. Golf and quad bike facilities are available in the area.
Free Wi-Fi and free private parking are provided. Jamaa El Fna Square and the Medina are located 4.8 miles away. Marrakech Train Station is an 5 miles distance away and Marrakesh Menara Airport is 7.5 miles away.

hotel_desc_title: Get the celebrity treatment with world-class service at The Pearl Marrakech
hotel_desc_summary:
The Pearl Marrakech features a rooftop swimming pool, 3 restaurants and a lounge bar with an art gallery. You can browse the on-site luxury shops or walk 15 minutes to the Royal Palace and Jamaâ el Fna Square.
The chic rooms and suites at The Pearl Marrakech feature a private balcony and a sitting area. Each one has been decorated using oriental influences and includes a private bathroom with bathrobes and slippers.
Homemade cake and pastries are available for breakfast every morning at this 5-star hotel. You can also sample Italian, French and Moroccan cuisine on the terraces while admiring the panoramic views.
Facilities available for an extra fee include a spa with a hammam (public bath), a sauna and beauty treatments. Free parking is available on site and Marrakech-Menara Airport is a 13-minute drive from the hotel.
